entry.source: File Viewing vulnerability discovered by Naif <naif@itapac.net>, buffer overflow discovered by FuSyS <fusys@s0ftpj.org>. Posted in a s0ftpj <http://www.s0ftpj.org > advisory on June 9, 2000.
entry.vuln-descript: MailStudio 2000 2.0和更早的版本的mailview.cgi CGI程序存在漏洞。远程攻击者借助..(点 点)攻击可以读取任意文件。
entry.vuln-solution: Currently the SecurityFocus staff are not aware of any vendor supplied patches for this issue. If you feel we are in error or are aware of more recent information, please mail us at: vuldb@securityfocus.com.

entry.name: Kerberos4 KDC AUTH_MSG_KDC_REQUEST无效终止漏洞
entry.source: First posted to Bugtraq by Tom Yu <tlyu@mit.edu> on June 9, 2000.
entry.vuln-descript: Kerberos 4 KDC程序存在缓冲区溢出漏洞。远程攻击者借助process_v4函数中localrealm变量导致拒绝服务漏洞。

ref.ref-name: 20000609 Security Advisory: MULTIPLE DENIAL OF SERVICE VULNERABILITIES IN KRB4 KDC

entry.vuln-solution: Patches and the MIT advisory are available at: http://web.mit.edu/kerberos/www/advisories/index.html

entry.name: Ceilidh拒绝服务漏洞
entry.vuln-descript: Ceilidh存在漏洞。远程攻击者借助大量POST请求导致拒绝服务。

ref.ref-name: 20000608 DST2K0010: DoS & Path Revealing Vulnerability in Ceilidh v2.60a

entry.name: Kerberos4 KDC AUTH_MSG_KDC_REQUEST无效终止漏洞
entry.vuln-descript: Kerberos 4 KDC程序存在缓冲区溢出漏洞。远程攻击者借助kerb_err_reply函数中e_msg变量导致拒绝服务。

ref.ref-name: 20000609 Security Advisory: MULTIPLE DENIAL OF SERVICE VULNERABILITIES IN KRB4 KDC

entry.name: Kerberos4 KDC AUTH_MSG_KDC_REQUEST无效终止漏洞
entry.vuln-descript: Kerberos 4 KDC程序无法正确检查出AUTH_MSG_KDC_REQUEST请求的无效终止。远程攻击者借助畸形请求导致拒绝服务。

ref.ref-name: 20000609 Security Advisory: MULTIPLE DENIAL OF SERVICE VULNERABILITIES IN KRB4 KDC

entry.name: Kerberos4 KDC "double-free" 拒绝服务漏洞
entry.source: First posted to Bugtraq by Tom Yu <tlyu@mit.edu> on June 9, 2000.
entry.vuln-descript: Kerberos 4 KDC程序不正确释放内存两次(又称为 "double-free")。远程攻击者利用此漏洞导致拒绝服务。

ref.ref-name: 20000609 Security Advisory: MULTIPLE DENIAL OF SERVICE VULNERABILITIES IN KRB4 KDC

entry.vuln-solution: Patches and the MIT advisory are available at: http://web.mit.edu/kerberos/www/advisories/index.html

entry.name: 3R Soft MailStudio 2000多重漏洞
entry.source: File Viewing vulnerability discovered by Naif <naif@itapac.net>, buffer overflow discovered by FuSyS <fusys@s0ftpj.org>. Posted in a s0ftpj <http://www.s0ftpj.org > advisory on June 9, 2000.
entry.vuln-descript: MailStudio 2000 2.0和更早的版本的userreg.cgi CGI程序存在漏洞。远程攻击者借助shell元字符可以执行任意命令。
entry.vuln-solution: Currently the SecurityFocus staff are not aware of any vendor supplied patches for this issue. If you feel we are in error or are aware of more recent information, please mail us at: vuldb@securityfocus.com.

entry.name: Linux Capabilities漏洞
entry.source:
Discovered by Wojciech Purczynski <wp@elzabsoft.pl> and reported to Bugtraq by the Sendmail Security Team <sendmail-security@SENDMAIL.ORG>.
More information posted to Bugtraq by Gerrie <gerrie@hit2000.org> on June 7, 2000. Followup posted to Bugtraq by
entry.vuln-descript: Linux 2.2.16之前版本中"capabilities"功能存在漏洞。本地用户通过设置capabilities阻止setuid程序降低权限daozhijjfw，又称为"Linux kernel setuid/setcap vulnerability."

ref.ref-name: 20000609 Sendmail & procmail local root exploits on Linux kernel up to 2.2.16pre5

entry.vuln-solution: Upgrade to Linux kernel version 2.2.16pre6 which is patched. Fixed packages for various linux distributions are available in the advisories linked to in the reference section of this vuldb entry.

entry.name: Big Brother命令任意执行漏洞
entry.vuln-descript: Big Brother 1.4h2版本和更早的版本的默认配置不包含正确的访问限制。远程攻击者通过使用bbd上传文件可以执行任意命令，该文件的扩展导致其被web服务器当做CGI脚本执行。

entry.name: FreeBSD Alpha端口缺少/dev/random/dev/urandom漏洞
entry.source: First made public in FreeBSD advisory FreeBSD-SA-00:25 on June 12, 2000.
entry.vuln-descript: FreeBSD的OpenSSL 0.9.4 和OpenSSH不能正确检查/dev/random或/dev/urandom设备的存在性，FreeBSD Alpha缺少这些设备。此漏洞导致设备产生容易破解的弱密钥。
entry.vuln-solution: OpenSSL 0.9.5 added checks to make sure the calls that use (open, read from, etc) the devices work. FreeBSD corrected the following distributions for the Alpha platform on the dates listed below: 2000-05-10 (4.0-STABLE) 2000-04-28 (5.0-CURRENT) If you are using a FreeBSD distribution of these versions obtained earlier than the dates shown, you can take the following steps (copied from the advisory): 1a) Upgrade your FreeBSD/Alpha system to FreeBSD 4.0-STABLE after the correction date. 1b) install the patched 4.0-RELEASE GENERIC kernel available from: ftp://ftp.freebsd.org/pub/FreeBSD/CERT/patches/SA-00:25/kernel.gz e.g. perform the following steps as root: # fetch ftp://ftp.freebsd.org/pub/FreeBSD/CERT/patches/SA-00:25/kernel.gz # fetch ftp://ftp.freebsd.org/pub/FreeBSD/CERT/patches/SA-00:25/kernel.gz.asc [ Verify the detached PGP signature using your PGP utility - consult your utility's documentation for how to do this ] # gunzip kernel.gz # cp /kernel /kernel.old # chflags noschg /kernel # cp kernel /kernel # chflags schg /kernel 1c) Download the kernel source patch and rebuild your FreeBSD/Alpha kernel, as follows: # fetch ftp://ftp.freebsd.org/pub/FreeBSD/CERT/patches/SA-00:25/kernel.sys.diff Download the detached PGP signature: # fetch ftp://ftp.freebsd.org/pub/FreeBSD/CERT/patches/SA-00:25/kernel.sys.diff.asc and verify the signature using your PGP utility. Apply the patch: # cd /usr/src # patch -p < /path/to/kernel.sys.diff Rebuild your kernel as described in http://www.freebsd.org/handbook/kernelconfig.html and reboot with the new kernel. NOTE: Because of the significant improvements to the FreeBSD/Alpha platform in FreeBSD 4.0, it is not planned at this time to backport the necessary changes to FreeBSD 3.4-STABLE. 2) Immediately regenerate all OpenSSH-generated SSH keys and OpenSSL-generated SSL certificates, and any other data relying on cryptographic random numbers which were generated on FreeBSD/Alpha systems, whose strength cannot be verified. [Note: for most systems, the only significant vulnerability is likely to be from OpenSSH and OpenSSL-generated keys and certificates (e.g. for SSL webservers)]

entry.name: Tigris远程访问服务器登录认证漏洞
entry.vuln-descript: Tigris远程访问服务器11.5.4.22之前的版本存在漏洞。当用户初始登录认证失败但最后成功时，无法正确记录Radius账户信息。

entry.name: SmartFTP Daemon 0.2访问控制漏洞
entry.vuln-descript: SmartFTP Daemon 0.2版本存在漏洞。本地用户借助..(点 点)攻击通过上传并指定一个备用的用户配置文件可以访问任意文件。

ref.ref-name: 20000613 SmartFTP Daemon v0.2 Beta Build 9 - Remote Exploit

entry.name: Solaris 8特权提升漏洞
entry.vuln-descript: Solaris 8和更早的版本存在缓冲区溢出漏洞。本地用户借助超长路径名提升根特权。

entry.name: Network Associates PGP认证服务器不可解决IP地址DoS漏洞
entry.source: Discovered by and posted to Bugtraq on June 13, 2000 by Ussr Labs <labs@ussrback.com>.
entry.vuln-descript: PGP Certificate Server 2.5.0和2.5.1版本的命令端口存在漏洞。远程攻击者利用此漏洞导致拒绝服务，如果主机名没有反向DNS入口并且连接到端口4000。

ref.ref-name: 20000614 Remote DoS attack in Networks Associates PGP Certificate Server Version 2.5 Vulnerability

entry.vuln-solution: Network Associates has released a patch which rectifies this issue. It is currently available at: http://www.tis.com/support/hotfix.html

entry.name: Norton Antivirus for Exchange漏洞
entry.vuln-descript: 在某些情况下，Norton Antivirus for Exchange（NavExchange）进入"fail-open"状态，使病毒可以通过服务器。

ref.ref-name: 20000614 Vulnerabilities in Norton Antivirus for Exchange

entry.name: Norton Antivirus for Exchange拒绝服务漏洞
entry.vuln-descript: Norton Antivirus for Exchange (NavExchange)存在缓冲区溢出漏洞。远程攻击者借助包含超长文件名的.zip文件导致拒绝服务漏洞。

ref.ref-name: 20000614 Vulnerabilities in Norton Antivirus for Exchange

entry.name: GSSFTP守护程序输入验证漏洞
entry.source: This vulnerability was posted to the Bugtraq mailing list on June 14, 2000 by Tom Yu <tlyu@mit.edu>
entry.vuln-descript: Kerberos 5 1.1.x版本的GSSFTP FTP守护程序无法正确限制一些FTP命令的访问权。远程攻击者利用此漏洞导致拒绝服务，本地用户利用此漏洞可以提升根特权。

ref.ref-name: 20000614 Security Advisory: REMOTE ROOT VULNERABILITY IN GSSFTP DAEMON

entry.vuln-solution:
A patch is available below. MIT Kerberos 5 5.0 -1.1
  • MIT ftpd_111_patch http://web.mit.edu/kerberos/www/advisories/ftpd_111_patch.txt
MIT Kerberos 5 5.0 -1.2beta1
  • MIT ftpd_111_patch http://web.mit.edu/kerberos/www/advisories/ftpd_111_patch.txt
MIT Kerberos 5 5.0 -1.2beta2
  • MIT ftpd_111_patch http://web.mit.edu/kerberos/www/advisories/ftpd_111_patch.txt
MIT Kerberos 5 5.0 -1.1.1
  • MIT ftpd_111_patch http://web.mit.edu/kerberos/www/advisories/ftpd_111_patch.txt

entry.name: AnalogX SimpleServer WWW 1.05 DoS漏洞
entry.source: Discovered by and posted to Bugtraq on June 15, 2000 by Ussr Labs <labs@ussrback.com>.
entry.vuln-descript: AnalogX SimpleServer 1.05存在缓冲区溢出漏洞。远程攻击者借助cgi-bin目录程序的超长GET请求导致拒绝服务漏洞。
entry.vuln-solution:
Solution: AnalogX has released the following upgrade which addresses this issue: AnalogX SimpleServer:WWW 1.0.5
  • AnalogX sswwwi http://www.analogx.com/files/sswwwi.exe

20000616 Remote DoS Attack in Small HTTP Server ver. 1.212 Vulnerability

entry.name: Windows 2000访问控制漏洞。
entry.vuln-descript: Windows 2000存在漏洞。本地用户进程利用此漏洞可以访问相同Windows工作站内其他用户桌面，又称为"Desktop Separation"漏洞。

entry.name: Veritas Volume Manager命令添加漏洞
entry.vuln-descript: Veritas Volume Manager创建了全局可写的.server_pids文件。本地用户用户利用此漏洞可以在文件中添加任意命令，然后被vmsa_server执行。

entry.name: Alt-N MDaemon 2.8.5.0 UIDL DoS漏洞
entry.source: Posted to NTBugtraq on June 16, 2000 by Craig <Craig@FREENET.DE>.
entry.vuln-descript: MDaemon 2.8.5.0版本POP服务器存在竞争条件漏洞。本地用户通过进入UIDL命令并迅速退出服务器导致拒绝服务。

ref.ref-name: 20000616 mdaemon 2.8.5.0 WinNT and Win9x remote DoS

entry.vuln-solution: Alt-N has rectified this issue in Mdaemon V2.8.6.0 and all later versions.

entry.name: Panda Antivirus端口2001命令执行漏洞
entry.vuln-descript: Panda Antivirus端口2001的控制台存在漏洞。本地用户借助CMD命令可以再无认证情况下执行任意命令。

entry.name: XFree86 libICE拒绝服务漏洞
entry.vuln-descript: XFree86中libICE存在漏洞。远程攻击者借助指定不能被SKIP_STRING宏正确检查的超大值导致拒绝服务漏洞。

entry.name: Net Tools PKI服务器拒绝服务漏洞
entry.vuln-descript: Net Tools PKI服务器存在漏洞。远程攻击者借助超长HTTP请求导致拒绝服务。

entry.vuln-descript: libX11 X目录存在漏洞。远程攻击者借助导致libX11进入无限循环的0资源掩饰可以导致拒绝服务。

entry.name: Net Tools PKI服务器访问控制漏洞
entry.vuln-descript: Net Tools PKI服务器存在漏洞。当XUDA模板文件不包含其他文件的绝对路径名时，则无法正确限制远程攻击者的访问权。

entry.name: IRIX MIPSPro Compiler /tmp文件名可预测漏洞
entry.source: jose nazario※ jose@thegeekempire.net
entry.vuln-descript: IRIX是一款由SGI公司开发和维护的商业性质UNIX操作系统。 IRIX包含的MIPSpro编译器不正确建立临时文件，本地攻击者可以利用这个漏洞利用符号链接破坏任意文件。 MIPSPro 7.2.1分发版本的C、C++、F77等F90主要编译器，都会在/tmp目录下建立可预测文件名的文件，其权限为运行编译器的用户umask确定，本地攻击者可以通过猜测文件名，利用符号链接，以其他用户权限破坏系统任意文件，或者执行任意代码。

ref.ref-name: 20000621 Predictability Problems in IRIX Cron and Compilers

entry.vuln-solution: 厂商补丁： SGI --- 目前厂商还没有提供补丁或者升级程序，我们建议使用此软件的用户随时关注厂商的主页以获取最新版本： http://www.sgi.com/support/security/

entry.name: Red Hat Linux gkermit文件修改漏洞
entry.vuln-descript: Red Hat Linux setgid uucp没有正确安装gkermit。本地用户利用此漏洞可以修改属于uucp的文件。

entry.name: 多个Linux供应商KON (Kanji On Console)缓冲区溢出漏洞
entry.source: This vulnerability was posted to the Bugtraq mailing list by Chris Evans <chris@ferret.lmh.ox.ac.uk> on Mon, Jun 19 2000. A detailed followup with an exploit was developed and posted by "Black Sphere" <bsphere@usa.net> on Fri, Aug 4 2000.
entry.vuln-descript: Linux Kanji on Console (KON)包中kon程序存在缓冲区溢出漏洞。本地用户借助long -StartupMessage参数可以提升根特权。
entry.vuln-solution: Remove the setuid bit on kon and fld.

entry.name: BEA WebLogic 5.1.0源代码泄露漏洞
entry.vuln-descript: BEA WebLogic 5.1.0版本默认配置存在漏洞。远程攻击者借助请求/file/开头的URL可以查看程序的源代码，从而导致默认servlet显示未经进一步处理的文件。

entry.name: 多个Linux供应商KON (Kanji On Console)缓冲区溢出漏洞
entry.source: This vulnerability was posted to the Bugtraq mailing list by Chris Evans <chris@ferret.lmh.ox.ac.uk> on Mon, Jun 19 2000. A detailed followup with an exploit was developed and posted by "Black Sphere" <bsphere@usa.net> on Fri, Aug 4 2000.
entry.vuln-descript: Linux Kanji on Console (KON)包中fld程序存在缓冲区溢出漏洞。本地用户借助包含CHARSET_REGISTRY或 CHARSET_ENCODING设置的输入文件可以提升根特权。
entry.vuln-solution: Remove the setuid bit on kon and fld.

entry.name: CUPS拒绝服务漏洞
entry.vuln-descript: CUPS (Common Unix Printing System) 1.04版本存在漏洞。远程攻击者借助CGI POST请求导致拒绝服务。

entry.name: IRIX crontab文件修改漏洞
entry.vuln-descript: IRIX crontab创建了含有可预测文件名和用户umask的临时文件。本地用户利用此漏洞可以修改另一个用户正在编辑的crontab文件。

ref.ref-name: 20000621 Predictability Problems in IRIX Cron and Compilers

entry.name: CUPS拒绝服务漏洞
entry.vuln-descript: CUPS (Common Unix Printing System) 1.04和更早的版本存在漏洞。远程攻击者借助畸形IPP请求导致拒绝服务。

entry.name: Allaire JRun 2.3.x Servlet敏感信息泄露漏洞

entry.name: Allaire JRun 2.3.x JSP文件访问控制漏洞

entry.name: Internet Security Systems BlackICE High UDP阻塞延迟漏洞
entry.source: Discovered by Mike DeMaria <demaria@nand.net> and posted to Bugtraq by Juancho Forlanda <juancho@networkice.com> on June 22, 2000.
entry.vuln-descript: BlackIce Defender 2.1及更早的版本和BlackIce Pro 2.0.23及更早的版本存在漏洞。当安全设置为Nervous或更低时，无法正确阻塞Back Orifice流量。

ref.ref-name: 20000620 BlackICE by Network ICE Corp vulnerability against Back Orifice 1.2

entry.vuln-solution: Currently the SecurityFocus staff are not aware of any vendor supplied patches for this issue. If you feel we are in error or are aware of more recent information, please mail us at: vuldb@securityfocus.com.

entry.name: xconq多重缓冲区溢出漏洞
entry.source: This vulnerability was first reported in a message to Bugtraq on June 22, 2000 by Stan Bubrouski <satan@fastdial.net>.
entry.vuln-descript: Red Hat Linux xconq和cconq game程序存在缓冲区溢出漏洞。本地用户借助超长用户环境变量提升额外特权。

ref.ref-name: 20000622 RHL 6.2 xconq package - overflows yield gid games

entry.vuln-solution: Currently the SecurityFocus staff are not aware of any vendor supplied patches for this issue. If you feel we are in error or are aware of more recent information, please mail us at: vuldb@securityfocus.com.

entry.name: NetWin dMailWeb and cwMail认证漏洞
entry.vuln-descript: NetWin dMailWeb and cwMail 2.6g和更早的版本存在漏洞。远程攻击者借助包含回车的用户名可以绕过认证并使用邮件中继服务器。

entry.name: NetWin dMailWeb和 cwMai拒绝服务漏洞
entry.vuln-descript: NetWin dMailWeb和 cwMail的默认配置信任所有POP服务器。本地用户利用此漏洞可以绕过普通认证并导致拒绝服务。

entry.name: ISC DHCP客户端缓冲区溢出漏洞
entry.source: First discussed on the dhcp-client mailing list, discovery credit given to the OpenBSD team. Posted to Bugtraq by Ted Lemon <mellon@nominum.com> on June 24, 2000.
entry.vuln-descript: ISC DHCP客户端程序dhclient存在漏洞。远程攻击者借助shell元字符可以执行任意命令。

ref.ref-name: 20000628 dhcp client: remote root exploit in dhcp client
20000624 Possible root exploit in ISC DHCP client.

entry.vuln-solution:
The newest patched versions are 2.0pl3 and 3.0b1pl17. Previous patches (2.0pl1 and 3.0b1pl14) did not completely fix this vulnerability. FTP: ftp://ftp.isc.org/isc/dhcp Anonymous CVS: http://www.isc.org/products/DHCP/anoncvs.html. An upgrade to FreeBSD 4.1 should resolve this problem. Below are patches for ports version of ISC dhcp: FreeBSD FreeBSD 4.0
  • FreeBSD ports-4 i386 isc-dhcp3 ftp://ftp.FreeBSD.org/pub/FreeBSD/ports/i386/packages-4-stable/net/isc -dhcp3-3.0.b1.17.tgz
Turbolinux Turbolinux 6.0.5
  • Turbolinux 6.1 i386 dhcp-2.0pl5-2.i386.rpm ftp://ftp.turbolinux.com/pub/updates/6.0/security/dhcp-2.0pl5-2.i386.r pm
  • Turbolinux 6.1 i386 dhcp-client-2.0pl5-2.i386.rpm ftp://ftp.turbolinux.com/pub/updates/6.0/security/dhcp-client-2.0pl5-2 .i386.rpm
Turbolinux Turbolinux 6.1
  • Turbolinux 6.1 i386 dhcp-2.0pl5-2.i386.rpm ftp://ftp.turbolinux.com/pub/updates/6.0/security/dhcp-2.0pl5-2.i386.r pm
  • Turbolinux 6.1 i386 dhcp-client-2.0pl5-2.i386.rpm ftp://ftp.turbolinux.com/pub/updates/6.0/security/dhcp-client-2.0pl5-2 .i386.rpm

entry.name: LeafDigital LeafChat 1.7 DoS漏洞
entry.source: Posted to Bugtraq on June 25, 2000 by Andrew Lewis <wizdumb@unix.za.net>.
entry.vuln-descript: LeafChat 1.7版本IRC客户端存在漏洞。远程IRC服务器通过迅速发送大量错误信息导致拒绝服务。
entry.vuln-solution: Currently the SecurityFocus staff are not aware of any vendor supplied patches for this issue. If you feel we are in error or are aware of more recent information, please mail us at: vuldb@securityfocus.com.

entry.name: Flowerfire Sawmill文件访问漏洞
entry.source: Posted to BugTraq on June 26th by Larry Cashdollar (lwc@vapid.dhs.org).
entry.vuln-descript: SawMill 5.0.21版本CGI程序存在漏洞。远程攻击者通过列表rfcf参数文件可以读取任意文件的第一行，那些文件的内容SawMill试图解析配置命令。

ref.ref-name: 20000626 sawmill5.0.21 old path bug & weak hash algorithm
20000706 Patch for Flowerfire Sawmill Vulnerabilities Available

entry.vuln-solution:
Flowerfire has upgraded their product free of charge to address this problem. Flowerfire Sawmill 5.0.21
  • Flowerfire http://www.flowerfire.com/

entry.name: HP TurboIMAGE DBUTIL特权提升漏洞
entry.vuln-descript: HP TurboIMAGE DBUTIL存在漏洞。本地用户借助DBUTIL.PUB.SYS可以提升额外特权。

entry.name: NetWare 5.1 Netscape Enterprise Server拒绝服务漏洞
entry.vuln-descript: NetWare 5.1中Netscape Enterprise Server存在漏洞。远程攻击者借助畸形URL导致拒绝服务或执行任意命令。

ref.ref-name: 20000626 Netscape Enterprise Server for NetWare Virtual Directory Vulnerab ility

entry.source: Posted to Bugtraq June 26th, 2000 by Larry Cashdollar <lwc@vapid.dhs.org>
entry.vuln-descript: SawMill 5.0.21版本使用弱加密存储密码。攻击者可以轻松破解密码并修改SawMill配置。

ref.ref-name: 20000626 sawmill5.0.21 old path bug & weak hash algorithm
20000706 Patch for Flowerfire Sawmill Vulnerabilities Available

Flowerfire has upgraded their product free of charge to address this problem. Flowerfire Sawmill 5.0.21

entry.name: Fortech Proxy+远程登录网关漏洞
entry.source: Discovered by and posted to Bugtraq on June 26, 2000 Andrew Lewis <wizdumb@unix.za.net>.
entry.vuln-descript: Fortech Proxy+存在漏洞。远程攻击者通过远程代理重定向连接可以绕过管理员服务的访问限制。
entry.vuln-solution: Currently the SecurityFocus staff are not aware of any vendor supplied patches for this issue. If you feel we are in error or are aware of more recent information, please mail us at: vuldb@securityfocus.com.

entry.name: Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.01和 Access 2000 / 97 VBA代码执行漏洞
entry.source: Posted to Bugtraq on June 27, 2000 by Georgi Guninski <joro@nat.bg>.
entry.vuln-descript: Internet Explorer 5.x版本开启Microsoft Access数据库文件文件之前无法警告用户，该文件引用于HTML文件ActiveX OBJECT标签。远程攻击者利用此漏洞可以执行任意文件，又称为"IE Script"漏洞。

ref.ref-name: 20000627 FW: IE 5 and Access 2000 vulnerability - executing programs
20000627 IE 5 and Access 2000 vulnerability - executing programs

entry.vuln-solution: Microsoft has released the following patch which eliminates the vulnerability. It is available for download at the following location: http://www.microsoft.com/windows/ie/download/critical/patch11.htm

entry.name: Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.01 和Excel/Powerpoint 2000 ActiveX 对象执行漏洞
entry.source: Posted to Bugtraq on June 27, 2000 by Georgi Guninski <joro@nat.bg>.
entry.vuln-descript: Microsoft Office 2000 (Excel and PowerPoint)和PowerPoint 97标记为可安全执行脚本。远程攻击者借助Visual Basic for Applications (VBA) SaveAs函数强制Internet Explorer或电子邮件客户端将文件保存到任意位置，又称为"Office HTML Script"漏洞。

ref.ref-name: 20000627 IE 5 and Excel 2000, PowerPoint 2000 vulnerability - executing programs

entry.vuln-solution:
Microsoft has released the following patches which eliminates the vulnerability. Once the patch is installed, Excel 2000 or PowerPoint 2000 can only be scripted if the Initialize and script ActiveX controls marked unsafe option in Internet Explorer is set to Enable. Microsoft Excel 2000
  • Microsoft Addinsec http://download.microsoft.com/download/office2000prem/Addinsec/2000/WI N98/EN-US/Addinsec.exe
Microsoft PowerPoint 97
  • Microsoft ppt97sec http://download.microsoft.com/download/powerpoint97win95/ppt97sec/97/W IN98/EN-US/ppt97sec.EXE
Microsoft PowerPoint 2000
  • Microsoft Addinsec http://download.microsoft.com/download/office2000prem/Addinsec/2000/WI N98/EN-US/Addinsec.exe

entry.name: SapporoWorks WinProxy缓冲区溢出漏洞
entry.source: Discovered by UNYUN <shadowpenguin@backsection.net> and posted to Bugtraq on June 27, 2000 by Nobuo Miwa <n-miwa@lac.co.jp>.
entry.vuln-descript: WinProxy 2.0和2.0.1版本存在漏洞。远程攻击者通过发送不含HTTP版本号列表的HTTP GET请求导致拒绝服务。
entry.vuln-solution: SapporoWorks has released version 2.0.2 which eliminates the vulnerability and is available for download at the following location: http://homepage2.nifty.com/spw/winproxy/download.html

entry.name: FirstClass Internet Services server拒绝服务漏洞
entry.vuln-descript: FirstClass Internet Services server 5.770和其他6.1之前的版本存在漏洞。远程攻击者通过发送含有超长To：邮件标题的电子邮件导致拒绝服务。

entry.name: SapporoWorks WinProxy缓冲区溢出漏洞
entry.source: Discovered by UNYUN <shadowpenguin@backsection.net> and posted to Bugtraq on June 27, 2000 by Nobuo Miwa <n-miwa@lac.co.jp>.
entry.vuln-descript: WinProxy 2.0和2.0.1版本存在缓冲区溢出漏洞。远程攻击者借助超长USER, PASS, LIST, RETR,或DELE命令可以执行任意命令。
entry.vuln-solution: SapporoWorks has released version 2.0.2 which eliminates the vulnerability and is available for download at the following location: http://homepage2.nifty.com/spw/winproxy/download.html

entry.name: iMesh.Com iMesh 1.02缓冲区溢出漏洞
entry.source: Posted to Bugtraq on June 29, 2000 by Blue Panda <bluepanda@mail.box.sk>.
entry.vuln-descript: iMesh 1.02版本存在缓冲区溢出漏洞。远程攻击者借助超长iMesh端口字符串可以执行任意命令。
entry.vuln-solution: Currently the SecurityFocus staff are not aware of any vendor supplied patches for this issue. If you feel we are in error or are aware of more recent information, please mail us at: vuldb@securityfocus.com. iMesh.com are aware of the issue and are working towards eliminating the vulnerability with the next release of the application.

entry.name: Dalnet IRC Server "SUMMON"缓冲区溢出漏洞
entry.source: First reported in a post to VULN-DEV by Shok <shok@cannabis.dataforce.net> on June 29, 2000.
entry.vuln-descript: Dalnet IRC server 4.6.5版本存在缓冲区溢出漏洞。远程攻击者借助SUMMON命令导致拒绝服务或执行任意命令。

entry.name: Microsoft Windows 9x / NT 4.0ARP伪造漏洞
entry.source: Posted to Bugtraq on June 29, 2000 by Paul Starzetz <paul@starzetz.de>. Additional information provided by Wojciech Woch <WWoch@CPR.FR>.
entry.vuln-descript: Windows 95和Windows 98无法正确处理伪造的ARP数据包。远程攻击者利用此漏洞可以覆盖在缓存表中的静态条目。
entry.vuln-solution: Currently the SecurityFocus staff are not aware of any vendor supplied patches for this issue. If you feel we are in error or are aware of more recent information, please mail us at: vuldb@securityfocus.com.

entry.name: vpopmail格式化字符串借助用户输入漏洞
entry.source: This vulnerability was posted to the Bugtraq mailing list on June 30, 2000 by H D Moore <hdm@secureaustin.com>
entry.vuln-descript: vpopmail 4.8版本之前的vchkpw程序无法正确清洗调用到syslog的非信任格式化字符串。远程攻击者借助包含任意格式化指令的USER 或PASS命令导致拒绝服务漏洞。
entry.vuln-solution:
Version 4.8 of vpopmail is not vulnerable to this program. Upgrades can be found at http://www.inter7.com/vpopmail Inter7 vpopmail (vchkpw) 4.5
  • Inter7 vpopmail http://www.inter7.com/vpopmail
Inter7 vpopmail (vchkpw) 4.7
  • Inter7 vpopmail http://www.inter7.com/vpopmail

entry.name: Microsoft Windows 2000远程CPU超载漏洞
entry.source: Posted to BugTraq on June 30, 2000 in an advisory by SecureXpert Labs, in which the following individuals are credited: Mike Murray, Max Degtyar, and Richard Reiner, all of SecureXpert Labs.
entry.vuln-descript: Windows 2000 Server存在漏洞。远程攻击者通过发送连续的二进制0数据流到不同TCP和UDP端口，这导致CPU使用率大大增加。
entry.vuln-solution: Currently the SecurityFocus staff are not aware of any vendor supplied patches for this issue. If you feel we are in error or are aware of more recent information, please mail us at: vuldb@securityfocus.com.

entry.name: Microsoft Windows 2000 Telnet Server DoS漏洞
entry.source: Posted to BugTraq on June 30, 2000 in an advisory by SecureXpert Labs, in which the following individuals are credited: Mike Murray, Max Degtyar, and Richard Reiner, all of SecureXpert Labs.
entry.vuln-descript: Windows 2000 Telnet Server存在漏洞。远程攻击者通过发送连续的二进制0数据流到不同TCP和UDP端口，这导致服务器崩溃。
entry.vuln-solution:
Vendor updates are available. Please see the references for more information. Microsoft Windows 2000 Professional
  • Microsoft Q267843 http://www.microsoft.com/Downloads/Release.asp?ReleaseID=22753
Microsoft Windows 2000 Advanced Server
  • Microsoft Q267843 http://www.microsoft.com/Downloads/Release.asp?ReleaseID=22753
Microsoft Windows 2000 Server
  • Microsoft Q267843 http://www.microsoft.com/Downloads/Release.asp?ReleaseID=22753

entry.name: Check Point Firewall-1 SMTP资源消耗漏洞
entry.source: Posted to BugTraq on June 30, 2000 in an advisory by SecureXpert Labs, in which the following individuals are credited: Mike Murray, Max Degtyar, and Richard Reiner, all of SecureXpert Labs.
entry.vuln-descript: Check Point FireWall-1 4.0和4.1版本存在漏洞。远程攻击者通过发送无效命令流（例如二进制0）到SMTP安全服务器代理导致拒绝服务。
entry.vuln-solution:
These latest Service Packs address the described denial of service issue. It is important to note that even without the new service packs installed, this attack does not disable firewall operations in general, only operation of the SMTP Security Server, since the Security Server operates with a lower processor priority than the FireWall-1 kernel module. Check Point Software Firewall-1 4.0
  • Check Point Software Service Packs http://www.checkpoint.com/techsupport/index.html
Check Point Software Firewall-1 4.1
  • Check Point Software Service Packs http://www.checkpoint.com/techsupport/index.html

entry.name: Sybergen Sygate拒绝服务漏洞
entry.vuln-descript: Sybergen Sygate存在漏洞。远程攻击者借助发送畸形DNS UDP包到内部接口导致拒绝服务。

ref.ref-name: 20000630 Any LAN user can crash Sygate

entry.name: Sybergen Secure Desktop 2.1多重漏洞
entry.source: Posted to Bugtraq on June 30, 2000 by Anders Ingeborn <ingeborn@infosec.se>.
entry.vuln-descript: Sybergen Secure Desktop 2.1版本无法正确防止虚假路由器广告(ICMP type 9)。远程攻击者利用此漏洞可以修改默认路由。

ref.ref-name: 20000630 Multiple vulnerabilities in Sybergen Secure Desktop

entry.vuln-solution: Currently the SecurityFocus staff are not aware of any vendor supplied patches for this issue. If you feel we are in error or are aware of more recent information, please mail us at: vuldb@securityfocus.com.

entry.name: Windows NT管理员账户漏洞
entry.vuln-descript: Windows NT管理员账户有默认的管理员默认名称。

entry.name: Canna远程缓冲区溢出漏洞
entry.source: This vulnerability was first disclosed in an advisory by Shadow Penguin Security on June 29, 2000. It was subsequently disclosed via a number of vendor advisories.
entry.vuln-descript: Canna输入系统存在缓冲区溢出漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助带有超长用户名或群组名的SR_INIT命令执行任意命令。
entry.vuln-solution: Information with regards to how to obtain fixes for Debian was published in the attached advisory (Debian-00-012: New version of canna released). The fix links provided in the advisory are no longer available. FreeBSD has released a Security Notice FreeBSD-SN-02:05. Users of FreeBSD systems are strongly urged to upgrade their ports tree to fix various reported issues. Further information can be found in the referenced Security Notice. This advisory supercedes the previous advisory (FreeBSD-SA-00:31).

entry.name: 多个供应商man(1) 'makewhatis'不安全/tmp文件漏洞
entry.source: This problem was detailed in (the attached) RedHat advisory RHSA-2000:041-02 and posted to the Bugtraq mailing list on Mon, 3 Jul 2000.
entry.vuln-descript: Linux man程序包中的makewhatis存在漏洞。本地用户可以借助符号连接攻击来覆盖文件。
entry.vuln-solution:
Linux-Mandrake users (from the Advisory): Please upgrade to: md5sum: f4f87cab84a716a2ccb8c74b3325c0c9 6.0/RPMS/man-1.5g-15mdk.i586.rpm md5sum: 52d021732aa09d517eeff8b60d427a69 6.0/SRPMS/man-1.5g-15mdk.src.rpm md5sum: 2b01457036a6813fa616adbca97fcb36 6.1/RPMS/man-1.5g-15mdk.i586.rpm md5sum: 52d021732aa09d517eeff8b60d427a69 6.1/SRPMS/man-1.5g-15mdk.src.rpm md5sum: ea883685faa409148f9b55c442a0438c 7.0/RPMS/man-1.5g-15mdk.i586.rpm md5sum: 52d021732aa09d517eeff8b60d427a69 7.0/SRPMS/man-1.5g-15mdk.src.rpm md5sum: fbc1b9e04d75f267650f291d99f467f1 7.1/RPMS/man-1.5g-15mdk.i586.rpm md5sum: 52d021732aa09d517eeff8b60d427a69 7.1/SRPMS/man-1.5g-15mdk.src.rpm To upgrade automatically, use < MandrakeUpdate >. If you want to upgrade manually, download the updated package from one of our FTP server mirrors and uprade with "rpm -Uvh package_name". All mirrors are listed on http://www.mandrake.com/en/ftp.php3. Updated packages are available in the "updates/" directory. For example, if you are looking for an updated RPM package for Mandrake 7.1, look for it in: updates/7.1/RPMS/ Trustix Secure Linux: URLs: Binary: http://www.trustix.net/download/Trustix/updates/1.1/RPMS/man-1.5g-11tr.i586.rpm ftp://ftp.trustix.com/pub/Trustix/updates/1.1/RPMS/man-1.5g-11tr.i586.rpm Source: http://www.trustix.net/download/Trustix/updates/1.1/SRPMS/man-1.5g-11tr.src.rpm ftp://ftp.trustix.com/pub/Trustix/updates/1.1/SRPMS/man-1.5g-11tr.src.rpm RedHat man-1.5f-1.i386.rpm

  • Red Hat Inc. 6.2 sparc man-1.5h1-2.6.x.sparc.rpm ftp://updates.redhat.com/6.2/sparc/man-1.5h1-2.6.x.sparc.rpm

entry.name: BitchX IRC客户端"/INVITE"格式字符串漏洞
entry.source: Posted to BugTraq on July 3, 2000 by Zinx Verituse <zinx@linuxfreak.com>. Reported to the BitchX developers by eTs on efnet.
entry.vuln-descript: BitchX IRC客户端不能正确净化不可信格式字符串，远程攻击者可以借助对名称中含特殊格式字符的信道的邀请来导致服务拒绝。

ref.ref-name: 20000704 BitchX exploit possibly waiting to happen, certain DoS

entry.vuln-solution:
Use the supplied patches or upgrade to a patched version. See the advisories under the "Credit" tab for vendor-specific packages. BitchX IRC Client 75p3
  • Christopher Schulte bitchx75.patch http://www.securityfocus.com/data/vulnerabilities/paches/bitchx75.patc h
BitchX IRC Client 1.0 c16
  • Chris Collins bitchx10-c16.patch http://www.securityfocus.com/data/vulnerabilities/patches/bitchx10-c16 .patch

entry.name: CGI-World Poll远程泄漏文件内容漏洞
entry.source: Adrian Daminato※ adrian@tucows.com
entry.vuln-descript: Poll 是一个用PERL编写的CGI程序，用于在网站上进行投票。 2.0版本的Poll存在一个问题可能会导致系统目录中的文件内容泄露。 Poll的Poll_It_SSI_v2.0.cgi程序可接受很多变量，这些变量可以被远程用户在提交的HTTP请求中控制，但是Poll并没有很好的限制这些输入的变量，可以用来查看系统中任意文件内容。恶意用户可以在data_dir参数中指定要查看的文件。
entry.vuln-solution: 临时解决方法： 如果您不能立刻安装补丁或者升级，CNNVD建议您采取以下措施以降低威胁： * 手工修改脚本，找到第 78 行: %in = &ReadForm 这条语句出现在初始化内部变量之后。 将该行移动到66行，使程序解析GET请求，然后设置内部变量成缺省值。 厂商补丁： CGI-World --------- 目前厂商还没有提供补丁或者升级程序，我们建议使用此软件的用户随时关注厂商的主页以获取最新版本： http://www.cgi-world.com/pollit.html

entry.name: AIX Oracle Web Listener服务拒绝漏洞
entry.vuln-descript: AIX 4.0.7.0.0版本和4.0.8.1.0版本的Oracle Web Listener存在漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助畸形URL导致服务拒绝。

ref.ref-name: 20000704 Oracle Web Listener for AIX DoS

entry.name: libedit任意命令执行漏洞
entry.vuln-descript: libedit在当前文件目录中而不是在用户主目录中搜寻.editrc文件，本地用户可以通过在另一个目录中安装畸形.editrc来执行任意命令。

entry.name: 可见系统Razor密码文件漏洞
entry.source: Posted to Bugtraq on July 5 2000 by Shawn Clifford <shawn.a.clifford@lmco.com>
entry.vuln-descript: Razor配置管理工具对密码文件使用弱加密术，本地用户可以提升特权。

ref.ref-name: 20000704 Recovering Passwords in Visible Systems' Razor

entry.vuln-solution: The vendor reports that current versions of Razor use a more robust encryption method and now have other mechanisms to address this vulnerability.

entry.name: SSH票据缓存嗅探漏洞
entry.vuln-descript: 带有Kerberos认证支持的SSH 1.2.27版本在创建于正登陆用户当前目录的文件中储存Kerberos票据，当主目录安装在NFS上时，远程攻击者可以嗅探票据缓存。

entry.name: Novell BorderManager URL规则限制绕过漏洞
entry.source: Posted to Bugtraq on July 5, 2000 Kevin R Smith <Kevin.Smith@firstdatacorp.co.uk>.
entry.vuln-descript: Novell BorderManager 3.0版本和3.5版本存在漏洞。远程攻击者可以通过请求URL中的编码字符绕过URL过滤。

ref.ref-name: 20000705 Novell BorderManager 3.0 EE - Encoded URL rule bypass

entry.vuln-solution:
Novell has issued a fix for this problem: Novell BorderManager 3.5
  • Novell Border Manager 3.5 Support Pack 3 http://support.novell.com/servlet/filedownload/pub/bm35sp3.exe

entry.name: LocalWEB HTTP缓冲区溢出漏洞
entry.source: This vulnerability was discovered by Underground Security Systems Research (USSR) and posted to the Bugtraq mailing list on Tue, 4 Jul 2000.
entry.vuln-descript: LocalWEB HTTP server 1.2.0版本存在漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助超长GET请求导致服务拒绝。

ref.ref-name: 20000703 Remote DoS Attack in LocalWEB HTTP Server 1.2.0 Vulnerability

entry.vuln-solution:
West Street Software LocalWEB HTTP Server 1.2
  • West Street Software LocalWEB HTTP Server UpgradeUpgrade to version 2.0 http://www.west-street.co.uk/download.htm

entry.name: Novell BorderManage用户冒充漏洞
entry.vuln-descript: Novell BorderManage中的ClientTrust程序不能正确地核实认证请求的起源，远程攻击者可以通过重放来自受害人机器端口3024的认证请求和响应来冒充另一个用户。

ref.ref-name: 20000707 Novell Border Manger - Anyone can pose as an authenticated user

entry.name: Wu-ftpd 2.6.0 SITE EXEC远程格式串溢出漏洞
entry.source: tf8 tf8@zolo.freelsd.net
entry.vuln-descript: Washington University FTP Server是一个非常流行的Unix系统下的FTP服务器。很多Unix和Linux的发行版本都把它作为默认安装的FTP服务器。 Wu-ftpd在SITE EXEC实现上存在格式化串溢出漏洞，远程攻击者可能利用此漏洞通过溢出攻击以root用户的权限执行任意指令。 Wu-ftpd的SITE EXEC将用户输入的数据错误的作为格式字符串传送给vsnprintf()函数，攻击者可以构造一个特殊的格式字符串，例如<retloc>%.f%.f%.f %.<ret>d%n来覆盖堆栈中的某些重要数据，返回地址或者保存的uid等等，攻击者可以远程执行系统命令。这种攻击并不等同于通常的缓冲区溢出攻击，主要是错误的使用vsnprintf()以及缺乏对用户输入数据的检查引起的。

ref.ref-name: 20000622 WuFTPD: Providing *remote* root since at least1994
20000707 New Released Version of the WuFTPD Sploit

entry.vuln-solution: 临时解决方法： 如果您不能立刻安装补丁或者升级，CNNVD建议您采取以下措施以降低威胁： * 可以使用这个临时的补丁程序， 重新编译wuftp2.6.0 diff -ur wu-ftpd-orig/src/ftpcmd.y wu-ftpd-2.6.0/src/ftpcmd.y --- wu-ftpd-orig/src/ftpcmd.y Wed Oct 13 08:15:28 1999 +++ wu-ftpd-2.6.0/src/ftpcmd.y Thu Jun 22 22:44:41 2000 @@ -1926,13 +1926,13 @@ } if (!maxfound) maxlines = defmaxlines; - lreply(200, cmd); + lreply(200, "%s", cmd); while (fgets(buf, sizeof buf, cmdf)) { size_t len = strlen(buf); if (len > 0 && buf[len - 1] == '\n') buf[--len] = '\0'; - lreply(200, buf); + lreply(200, "%s", buf); if (maxlines <= 0) ++lines; else if (++lines >= maxlines) { diff -ur wu-ftpd-orig/src/ftpd.c wu-ftpd-2.6.0/src/ftpd.c --- wu-ftpd-orig/src/ftpd.c Thu Jun 22 22:23:40 2000 +++ wu-ftpd-2.6.0/src/ftpd.c Thu Jun 22 22:45:23 2000 @@ -3157,7 +3157,7 @@ reply(230, "User %s logged in.%s", pw->pw_name, guest ? " Access restrictions apply." : ""); sprintf(proctitle, "%s: %s", remotehost, pw->pw_name); - setproctitle(proctitle); + setproctitle("%s", proctitle); if (logging) syslog(LOG_INFO, "FTP LOGIN FROM %s, %s", remoteident, pw->pw_name); /* H* mod: if non-anonymous user, copy it to "authuser" so everyone can @@ -5912,7 +5912,7 @@ remotehost[sizeof(remotehost) - 1] = '\0'; sprintf(proctitle, "%s: connected", remotehost); - setproctitle(proctitle); + setproctitle("%s", proctitle); wu_authenticate(); /* Create a composite source identification string, to improve the logging 厂商补丁： Caldera ------- Caldera已经为此发布了一个安全公告(CSSA-2000-020.0)以及相应补丁: CSSA-2000-020.0：wu-ftpd vulnerability 链接： http://www.caldera.com/support/security/advisories/CSSA-2000-020.0.txt 补丁下载： OpenLinux Desktop 2.3 Location of Fixed Packages The upgrade packages can be found on Caldera's FTP site at: ftp://ftp.calderasystems.com/pub/updates/OpenLinux/2.3/current/RPMS/ The corresponding source code package can be found at: ftp://ftp.calderasystems.com/pub/updates/OpenLinux/2.3/current/SRPMS Verification ddc86702f33d6a5edddab258ddd72195 RPMS/wu-ftpd-2.5.0-7.i386.rpm 8090110ecef8d1efd2fe4c279f209e29 SRPMS/wu-ftpd-2.5.0-7.src.rpm OpenLinux eServer 2.3 and OpenLinux eBuilder for ECential 3.0 Location of Fixed Packages The upgrade packages can be found on Caldera's FTP site at: ftp://ftp.calderasystems.com/pub/updates/eServer/2.3/current/RPMS/ The corresponding source code package can be found at: ftp://ftp.calderasystems.com/pub/updates/eServer/2.3/current/SRPMS Verification f909e8b47ec6780109c2437cdfdc2497 RPMS/wu-ftpd-2.5.0-7.i386.rpm 8354edf2f90e59aa96d8baf1d77e28a0 SRPMS/wu-ftpd-2.5.0-7.src.rpm . OpenLinux eDesktop 2.4 Location of Fixed Packages The upgrade packages can be found on Caldera's FTP site at: ftp://ftp.calderasystems.com/pub/updates/eDesktop/2.4/current/RPMS/ The corresponding source code package can be found at: ftp://ftp.calderasystems.com/pub/updates/eDesktop/2.4/current/SRPMS Verification d2df4fb386d65387039f33538571d907 RPMS/wu-ftpd-2.5.0-7.i386.rpm 13313d25d6d93dd98dd94e62d48c711c SRPMS/wu-ftpd-2.5.0-7.src.rpm Conectiva --------- Conectiva已经为此发布了一个安全公告(2000-06-23)以及相应补丁: 2000-06-23：Remote root compromise 链接： 补丁下载： DIRECT DOWNLOAD LINKS TO UPDATED PACKAGES ftp://ftp.conectiva.com.br/pub/conectiva/atualizacoes/4.0/i386/wu-ftpd-2.6.0-11cl.i386.rpm ftp://ftp.conectiva.com.br/pub/conectiva/atualizacoes/4.0es/i386/wu-ftpd-2.6.0-11cl.i386.rpm ftp://ftp.conectiva.com.br/pub/conectiva/atualizacoes/4.1/i386/wu-ftpd-2.6.0-11cl.i386.rpm ftp://ftp.conectiva.com.br/pub/conectiva/atualizacoes/4.2/i386/wu-ftpd-2.6.0-11cl.i386.rpm ftp://ftp.conectiva.com.br/pub/conectiva/atualizacoes/5.0/i386/wu-ftpd-2.6.0-11cl.i386.rpm ftp://ftp.conectiva.com.br/pub/conectiva/atualizacoes/servidor-1.0/i386/wu-ftpd-2.6.0-11cl.i386.rpm DIRECT LINK TO THE SOURCE PACKAGES ftp://ftp.conectiva.com.br/pub/conectiva/atualizacoes/4.0/SRPMS/wu-ftpd-2.6.0-11cl.i386.rpm ftp://ftp.conectiva.com.br/pub/conectiva/atualizacoes/4.0es/SRPMS/wu-ftpd-2.6.0-11cl.i386.rpm ftp://ftp.conectiva.com.br/pub/conectiva/atualizacoes/4.1/SRPMS/wu-ftpd-2.6.0-11cl.i386.rpm ftp://ftp.conectiva.com.br/pub/conectiva/atualizacoes/4.2/SRPMS/wu-ftpd-2.6.0-11cl.i386.rpm ftp://ftp.conectiva.com.br/pub/conectiva/atualizacoes/5.0/SRPMS/wu-ftpd-2.6.0-11cl.i386.rpm ftp://ftp.conectiva.com.br/pub/conectiva/atualizacoes/servidor-1.0/SRPMS/wu-ftpd-2.6.0-11cl.i386.rpm Debian ------ Debian已经为此发布了一个安全公告(Debian-00-010)以及相应补丁: Debian-00-010：New Debian wu-ftpd packages released 链接： http://www.debian.org/security/2000/debian- 补丁下载： Source archives: http://security.d

entry.name: 多个供应商ftpd setproctitle()格式字符串漏洞
entry.source: This vulnerability was posted to the Bugtraq mailing list on July 5, 2000 by lamagra < lamagra@digibel.org>
entry.vuln-descript: 例如OpenBSD ftpd,NetBSD ftpd,ProFTPd和Opieftpd的FTP服务器不能正确净化在setproctitle函数（有时被称作set_proc_title）中被使用的不可信格式字符串，远程攻击者可以导致服务拒绝或者执行任意命令。
entry.vuln-solution:
OpenBSD ftpd: A patch is available at http://www.openbsd.org/errata.html#ftpd ProFTPD: Upgrade to ProFTPD 1.2.0 when it is available. Manual patch: Replace the call to setproctitle() in the set_proc_title() with a properly used format string. Replace: setproctitle(statbuf); with setproctitle("%s", statbuf); wu-ftpd - upgrade to version 2.6.1: ftp://ftp.wu-ftpd.org/pub/wu-ftpd/wu-ftpd-2.6.1.tar.gz ftp://ftp.wu-ftpd.org/pub/wu-ftpd/wu-ftpd-2.6.1.tar.gz.asc ftp://ftp.wu-ftpd.org/pub/wu-ftpd/wu-ftpd-2.6.1.tar.Z ftp://ftp.wu-ftpd.org/pub/wu-ftpd/wu-ftpd-2.6.1.tar.Z.asc SuSE Linux - updates are available. http://suse.de/de/support/security/suse_security_announce_571.txt Debian: This problem has been corrected in netstd 3.07-7slink.4 for Debian 2.1 (slink) and in ftpd 0.11-8potato.1 for Debian 2.2 (potato). We recommend upgrading your ftpd immediately. Fixed in: Debian 2.1 (slink): Source: http://security.debian.org/dists/slink/updates/source/netstd_3.07-7slink.4.diff.gz http://security.debian.org/dists/slink/updates/source/netstd_3.07-7slink.4.dsc http://security.debian.org/dists/slink/updates/source/netstd_3.07.orig.tar.gz alpha: http://security.debian.org/dists/slink/updates/binary-alpha/netstd_3.07-7slink.4_alpha.deb i386: http://security.debian.org/dists/slink/updates/binary-i386/netstd_3.07-7slink.4_i386.deb m68k: http://security.debian.org/dists/slink/updates/binary-m68k/netstd_3.07-7slink.4_m68k.deb sparc: http://security.debian.org/dists/slink/updates/binary-sparc/netstd_3.07-7slink.4_sparc.deb Debian 2.2 (potato): Source: http://security.debian.org/dists/potato/updates/main/source/linux-ftpd_0.11-8potato.1.diff.gz http://security.debian.org/dists/potato/updates/main/source/linux-ftpd_0.11-8potato.1.dsc http://security.debian.org/dists/potato/updates/main/source/linux-ftpd_0.11.orig.tar.gz arm: http://security.debian.org/dists/potato/updates/main/binary-arm/ftpd_0.11-8potato.1_arm.deb i386: http://security.debian.org/dists/potato/updates/main/binary-i386/ftpd_0.11-8potato.1_i386.deb sparc: http://security.debian.org/dists/potato/updates/main/binary-sparc/ftpd_0.11-8potato.1_sparc.deb ProFTPD Project ProFTPD 1.2 pre4

entry.name: Microsoft SQL Server 许可绕过漏洞
entry.vuln-descript: Microsoft SQL Server 7.0版本存在漏洞。本地用户可以借助暂时存储过程通过引用来绕过存储过程的许可，该漏洞也称为"Stored Procedure Permissions"漏洞。

entry.name: Guild FTPd文件存在确定漏洞
entry.vuln-descript: Guild FTPd存在漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助..（点 点）攻击确定FTP根外文件的存在，该漏洞提供取决于文件存在与否的不同出错消息。

ref.ref-name: 20000708 gnu-pop3d (FTGate problem), Savant Webserver, Guild FTPd

entry.name: Savant web服务器任意命令执行漏洞
entry.vuln-descript: Savant web服务器存在漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助超长GET请求来执行任意命令。

ref.ref-name: 20000708 gnu-pop3d (FTGate problem), Savant Webserver, Guild FTPd

entry.name: MiniVend shopping cart任意命令执行漏洞
entry.vuln-descript: MiniVend shopping cart程序中的view_page.html样本页面存在漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助shell元字符来执行任意命令。

ref.ref-name: 20000711 Akopia MiniVend Piped Command Execution Vulnerability

entry.name: tnef 0-123邮件解码器文件覆盖漏洞
entry.source: A S.u.S.E. Advisory was released on July 10, 2000 which addressed this issue.
entry.vuln-descript: Linux系统中Tnef程序存在漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助指定了解压缩输出绝对路径名的TNEF编码压缩附件来覆盖任意文件。

entry.name: Blackboard CourseInfo 4.0明文管理员密码漏洞
entry.source: Posted to NTBugtraq on July 10, 2000 by James Megna <jmegna@ucok.edu>.
entry.vuln-descript: Blackboard CourseInfo 4.0版本在访问控制允许用户访问密码的注册表钥明文中储存本地和SQL管理员用户名和密码。

ref.ref-name: 20000710 Two issues: Blackboard CourseInfo 4.0 stores admin password in clear text; strange settings on the winreg key.

entry.vuln-solution:
Blackboard has released a hotfix which will encrypt the information stored in the registry. Blackboard also recommends that users restrict remote access to the registry. Instructions to do so can be found at the following URL: http://www.microsoft.com/TechNet/security/c2config.asp#25 Users who have upgraded to version 5.0 are not susceptible to this vulnerability. Blackboard CourseInfo 4.0
  • Blackboard Courseinfo4hotfix http://company.blackboard.com/Support/files/Courseinfo4hotfix.exe

entry.name: Linux rpc.statd远程格式串溢出漏洞
entry.source: Chris Evans※ chris@ferret.lmh.ox.ac.uk
entry.vuln-descript: rpc.statd是一种用于监视并控制NFS的RPC守护进程，广泛运行于种Unix/Linux类操作系统上，程序使用NSM(Network Status Monitor)协议。 某些Linux系统所带的nfs-utils软件包中的rpc.statd程序存在一个格式串溢出漏洞，远程攻击者可以利用此漏洞通过溢出攻击在主机上以root用户的权限执行任意指令。 通过设置特殊的格式化字符串，并在某个buffer中提供可执行代码，可能允许远程攻击者覆盖rpc.statd堆栈中的某个返回地址，远程执行任意命令是可能的。由于rpc.statd通常是以root身份运行，而且没有丢弃root权限，因此溢出代码会以root身份执行。Debian、Red Hat、Connectiva和Mandrake Linux已经发布了安全公告并提供了安全补丁。其他运行rpc.statd的Linux也存在这个问题。幸运的是，默认情况下很多Linux并没有启动rpc.statd服务。

ref.ref-name: 20000716 Lots and lots of fun with rpc.statd

entry.vuln-solution: 厂商补丁： Conectiva --------- Conectiva已经为此发布了一个安全公告(2000-07-17)以及相应补丁: 2000-07-17：nfs-utils 链接： 补丁下载： Debian ------ Debian已经为此发布了一个安全公告(Debian-00-013)以及相应补丁: Debian-00-013：New Debian nfs-common packages released 链接： http://www.debian.org/security/2000/debian- 补丁下载： Source archives: http://http.us.debian.org/debian/dists/potato/main/source/net/nfs-utils_0.1.9.1-1.tar.gz http://http.us.debian.org/debian/dists/potato/main/source/net/nfs-utils_0.1.9.1-1.dsc Alpha architecture: http://http.us.debian.org/debian/dists/potato/main/binary-alpha/net/nfs-common_0.1.9.1-1.deb Intel ia32 architecture: http://http.us.debian.org/debian/dists/potato/main/binary-i386/net/nfs-common_0.1.9.1-1.deb PowerPC architecture: http://http.us.debian.org/debian/dists/potato/main/binary-powerpc/net/nfs-common_0.1.9.1-1.deb Sun Sparc architecture: http://http.us.debian.org/debian/dists/potato/main/binary-sparc/net/nfs-common_0.1.9.1-1.deb Debian Unstable alias woody - --------------------------- This version of Debian is not yet released. Fixes are currently available for Alpha, Intel ia32, PowerPC, and the Sun Sparc architecture. Fixes for other architectures will be available soon. Source archives: http://http.us.debian.org/debian/dists/unstable/main/source/net/nfs-utils_0.1.9.1-1.tar.gz http://http.us.debian. 补丁安装方法： 1. 手工安装补丁包： 首先，使用下面的命令来下载补丁软件： # wget url (url是补丁下载链接地址) 然后，使用下面的命令来安装补丁： # dpkg -i file.deb (file是相应的补丁名) 2. 使用apt-get自动安装补丁包： 首先，使用下面的命令更新内部数据库： # apt-get update 然后，使用下面的命令安装更新软件包： # apt-get upgrade MandrakeSoft ------------ 目前厂商已经发布了升级补丁以修复这个安全问题，请到厂商的主页下载： Linux-Mandrake 7.0: ftp://ftp.free.fr/pub/Distributions_Linux/Mandrake/updates/7.0/RPMS/nfs-utils-0.1.9.1-3mdk.i586.rpm ftp://ftp.free.fr/pub/Distributions_Linux/Mandrake/updates/7.0/RPMS/nfs-utils-clients-0.1.9.1-3mdk.i586.rpm ftp://ftp.free.fr/pub/Distributions_Linux/Mandrake/updates/7.0/SRPMS/nfs-utils-0.1.9.1-3mdk.src.rpm Linux-Mandrake 7.1: ftp://ftp.free.fr/pub/Distributions_Linux/Mandrake/updates/7.1/RPMS/nfs-utils-0.1.9.1-3mdk.i586.rpm ftp://ftp.free.fr/pub/Distributions_Linux/Mandrake/updates/7.1/RPMS/nfs-utils-clients-0.1.9.1-3mdk.i586.rpm ftp://ftp.free.fr/pub/Distributions_Linux/Mandrake/updates/7.1/SRPMS/nfs-utils-0.1.9.1-3mdk.src.rpm RedHat ------ RedHat已经为此发布了一个安全公告(RHSA-2000:043-03)以及相应补丁: RHSA-2000:043-03：Revised advisory: Updated package for nfs-utils available 链接：https://www.redhat.com/support/errata/RHSA-2000-043.html 补丁下载： Red Hat Linux 6.2: sparc: ftp://updates.redhat.com/6.2/sparc/nfs-utils-0.1.9.1-1.sparc.rpm alpha: ftp://updates.redhat.com/6.2/alpha/nfs-utils-0.1.9.1-1.alpha.rpm i386: ftp://updates.redhat.com/6.2/i386/nfs-utils-0.1.9.1-1.i386.rpm sources: ftp://updates.redhat.com/6.2/SRPMS/nfs-utils-0.1.9.1-1.src.rpm 可使用下列命令安装补丁： rpm -Fvh [文件名] Trustix ------- 目前厂商已经发布了升级补丁以修复这个安全问题，请到厂商的主页下载： Trustix Trustix Secure Linux 1.1: Trustix RPM nfs-utils-0.1.9.1-1tr.i586.rpm ftp://ftp.trustix.com/pub/Trustix/updates/1.1/RPMS/ Trustix Trustix Secure Linux 1.0: Trustix RPM nfs-utils-0.1.9.1-1tr.i586.rpm ftp://ftp.trustix.com/pub/Trustix/updates/1.1/RPMS/

entry.name: Microsoft IIS ISM.DLL文件名截断泄漏文件内容漏洞
entry.source: Nsfocus Security Team※ security@nsfocus.com
entry.vuln-descript: IIS是Microsoft的一个产品，是用来在网站上提供HTTP、FTP等的服务器程序。运行在Windows NT和Windows 2000操作系统上。 NSFocus 安全小组发现了微软 IIS 4.0/5.0的一个安全漏洞。攻击者可以利用这个漏洞来获取某些特定类型文件(例如：.ASP，.ASA，.INI等等文本类型文件以及二进制文件)的全部或者部分内容。而正常情况下，攻击者是不应该有权限访问这些文件或者浏览文件内容的。 攻击者会构造一个特殊格式的URL请求，它由一个目标文件名再加上"+"号以及".htr"后缀组成。例如：global.asa+.htr。当将这个URL提交给Microsoft IIS 4.0/5.0后，IIS会认为用户正在请求处理一个HTR文件，因此会将这个请求转交给ISM.DLL ASAPI应用程序去处理。ISM.DLL在打开并执行这个文件之前，会首先检查文件名。当在文件名中检查到一个"+"号以后，ISM.DLL会从这里将文件名截断，只保留"+"号以前的文件名(实际上就是真正要浏览的目标文件，例如：global.asa)，然后试图打开并执行它。如果该文件并不是HTR文件，ISM.DLL将会泄漏该文件的全部或者部分内容。通常，对于.ASP文件，ISM.DLL会删除其中的大部分内容，但是仍然可能泄漏一些敏感信息，例如包含文件(通常是.inc文件)的名字和路径等等。而对于global.asa文件，通常会将其全部内容显示出来，如果这个文件中包含一些重要敏感信息，例如SQL server数据库的用户名和密码，可能使攻击者更加容易地入侵或者攻击系统。
entry.vuln-solution: 临时解决方法： 如果您不能立刻安装补丁或者升级，CNNVD建议您采取以下措施以降低威胁： * 除非确实需要HTR脚本，否则我们建议您删除HTR的脚本映射。 具体步骤为： 1. 打开"Internet 服务管理器" 2. 在选中的服务器上按鼠标右键，选择"属性"，然后选择"主属性"中的"WWW 服务" 3. 选择"编辑...",然后选择"主目录",点击"配置..." 4. 从"应用程序映射"栏中删除".htr"项 厂商补丁： Microsoft --------- 我们已经将这个问题通报给了微软公司，微软已就此发布了一个安全公告以及相应补丁。 您可以在下例地址看到微软安全公告的详细内容： http://www.microsoft.com/technet/security/bulletin/MS00-044.asp 英文版的补丁程序可以在下列地址下载： IIS 4.0: http://www.microsoft.com/Downloads/Release.asp?ReleaseID=22709 IIS 5.0: http://www.microsoft.com/Downloads/Release.asp?ReleaseID=22708

entry.name: NetZero ZeroPort 3.0版本弱加密术方式漏洞
entry.source: Posted to Bugtraq on July 18, 2000 by Brian Carrier <bcarrier@atstake.com>.
entry.vuln-descript: NetZero 3.0版本及之前版本对储存用户登录信息使用弱加密术，本地用户可以解密密码。
entry.vuln-solution: Currently the SecurityFocus staff are not aware of any vendor supplied patches for this issue. If you feel we are in error or are aware of more recent information, please mail us at: vuldb@securityfocus.com.

entry.name: CSM Alibaba Web服务器DoS漏洞
entry.source: Discovered by and posted to Bugtraq on July 18, 2000 by Prizm <prizm@Resentment.org>.
entry.vuln-descript: Alibaba web服务器存在缓冲区溢出漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助超长GET请求来导致服务拒绝。
entry.vuln-solution: Currently the SecurityFocus staff are not aware of any vendor supplied patches for this issue. If you feel we are in error or are aware of more recent information, please mail us at: vuldb@securityfocus.com.

entry.name: Mandrake Linux用户模式数据包漏洞
entry.vuln-descript: Mandrake Linux用户模式数据包存在漏洞。本地用户利用该漏洞重新启动或者暂停系统。

entry.name: BlackBoard CourseInfo修改CourseInfo数据库信息且提升特权漏洞
entry.vuln-descript: BlackBoard CourseInfo 4.0版本不正确验证用户，本地用户通过直接调用支持CGI程序如：user_update_passwd.pl和user_update_admin.pl修改CourseInfo数据库信息且提升特权。

entry.name: Microsoft Outlook / Outlook Express GMT字段缓冲区溢出漏洞
entry.source: Discovered by USSR Labs <labs@ussrback.com> and reported to Microsoft on July 5, 2000. Posted to Bugtraq on July 18, 2000 by Aaron Drew <ripper@hotkey.net.au>.
entry.vuln-descript: Microsoft Outlook和Outlook Express存在缓冲区溢出漏洞。远程攻击者借助电子邮件头中的超长Date字段执行任意命令，又称为"Malformed E-mail Header"漏洞。
entry.vuln-solution:
Filters have been made for Sendmail and Postfix to deal with this issue. See the Bugtraq posts in the Credit section for more information. This vulnerability may be resolved through installing Internet Explorer 5.01 SP1 or Internet Explorer 5.5 on systems other than Microsoft Windows 2000. Vulnerable users of Windows 2000 may resolve this issue by installing Windows 2000 Service Pack 1. It has been reported that customers installing the patches on versions of Internet Explorer other than 4.01 SP2 or 5.01 may receive the message 'This update does not need to be installed on this system' when the patch is in fact required. Users are advised to install the patch regardless. Patches are available for some systems: Microsoft Outlook Express 4.0 1 SP2
  • Microsoft q261255.exe http://download.microsoft.com/download/ie4095/secpach9/4.01_SP2/W9XNT4 /EN-US/q261255.exe
Microsoft Outlook Express 5.0 1
  • Microsoft q261255.exe http://download.microsoft.com/download/ie501/secpach9/5.01/WIN98/EN-US /q261255.exe

entry.name: O'Reilly WebSite 'webfind.exe'缓冲区溢出漏洞
entry.source: This vulnerability was posted to the Bugtraq mailing list by Network Associates Inc. as COVERT-2000-08 on July 19, 2000 . Credit for discovery of this problem is attributed to Barnaby Jack of COVERT Labs.
entry.vuln-descript: O'Reilly WebSite Professional web server 2.x版本中的Webfind CGI程序存在缓冲区溢出漏洞。远程攻击者借助包含超长"keywords"参数的URL执行任意命令。
entry.vuln-solution:
Upgrade to at least version 2.5 of the software. OReilly Software WebSite Professional 2.3.18
  • O'Reilly & Associates WebSite 2.5 http://website.oreilly.com/support/software/wsp2x_updates.cfm
OReilly Software WebSite Professional 2.4
  • O'Reilly & Associates WebSite 2.5 http://website.oreilly.com/support/software/wsp2x_updates.cfm
OReilly Software WebSite Professional 2.4.9
  • O'Reilly & Associates WebSite 2.5 http://website.oreilly.com/support/software/wsp2x_updates.cfm

entry.name: Top Layer AppSwitch服务拒绝
entry.vuln-descript: Top Layer AppSwitch 2500版本存在漏洞。远程攻击者借助畸形的ICMP包导致服务拒绝。

entry.name: HP JetDirect打印机服务拒绝漏洞
entry.vuln-descript: HP JetDirect打印机G.08.20和H.08.20及其之前版本存在漏洞。远程攻击者借助畸形的FTP引用命令导致服务拒绝。

ref.ref-name: 20000719 HP Jetdirect - Invalid FTP Command DoS

entry.name: LPRng记录信息漏洞
entry.vuln-descript: LPRng 3.6.x版本不正确的安装lpd作为setuid根，本地用户利用该漏洞附加lpd痕迹且在文件中记录信息。

ref.ref-name: 20000709 LPRng lpd should not be SETUID root

entry.name: Apache Jakarta-Tomcat /admin文本漏洞
entry.source: This vulnerability was posted to the Bugtraq mailing list on July 20, 2000 by Scott Morris <smorris@gridnet.com>
entry.vuln-descript: Jakarta Tomcat的默认配置不限制/admin文本的访问权限，远程攻击者通过直接的调用管理servlets使得在根目录中添加一个文本从而读取任意文件。
entry.vuln-solution: Currently the SecurityFocus staff are not aware of any vendor supplied patches for this issue. If you feel we are in error or are aware of more recent information, please mail us at: vuldb@securityfocus.com.

entry.name: Microsoft Outlook和Outlook Express读取客户端系统的文件漏洞
entry.vuln-descript: Microsoft Outlook 98和2000,还有Outlook Express 4.0x和5.0x版本存在漏洞。远程攻击者借助存储缓存以外文件的畸形HTML信息读取客户端系统的文件。又称为"Cache Bypass"漏洞。

entry.name: Winamp缓冲区溢出漏洞
entry.vuln-descript: Winamp 2.64及其之前版本存在缓冲区溢出漏洞。远程攻击者通过超长#EXTINF:M3U播放列表的扩展执行任意命令。

ref.ref-name: 20000720 Winamp M3U playlist parser buffer overflow security vulnerability

entry.name: Microsoft Outlook Express的持续邮件浏览器的链接漏洞
entry.source: Details of this vulnerability were released in Microsoft Security Bulletin MS0-045 released on July 20, 2000.
entry.vuln-descript: Microsoft Outlook Express存在漏洞。远程攻击者通过创建一个到Outlook Express窗口的持续浏览链接监测用户的电子邮件。又称为"Persistent Mail-Browser Link"漏洞。
entry.vuln-solution: Perform a default installation of Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.01 Service Pack 1, or Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.5 on any system except Windows 2000. Microsoft has released patches for the affected software for those who do not wish to upgrade, available at http://www.microsoft.com/windows/ie/download/critical/patch9.htm

entry.name: WFTPD和WFTPD Pro服务拒绝漏洞
entry.vuln-descript: WFTPD和WFTPD Pro 2.41版本存在漏洞。远程攻击者通过LIST命令仍然执行时执行STAT命令从而导致服务拒绝。

entry.name: Roxen WebServer %00请求泄漏文件内容、目录列表漏洞
entry.source: zorgon※ zorgon@sdf.lonestar.org
entry.vuln-descript: Roxen WebServer是一个运行的Unix类平台上的Web服务器程序。 发现Roxen WebServer存在一个安全问题，可能会暴露CGI文件内容以及目录列表。 Roxen WebServer 对于以%00结尾的Web请求不能正确的处理，对于一个针对文件的请求，服务器会返回文件的内容，而不论该文件是否是CGI脚本；对于一个针对目录的请求，服务器会返回目录列表，不论该目录是否允许列文件。

ref.ref-name: 20000721 Roxen security alert: Problems with URLs containing null characters.

entry.vuln-solution: 厂商补丁： Roxen ----- 目前厂商已经发布了升级补丁以修复这个安全问题，请到厂商的主页下载： 尽管1.3.122版本并不受该漏洞影响，但是厂家也发布了一个针对1.3.122的补丁： ftp://ftp.roxen.com/pub/roxen/patches/roxen_1.3.122-http.pike.patch Roxen WebServer 2.0.X: ftp://ftp.roxen.com/pub/roxen/patches/roxen_2.0.50-http.pike.patch

entry.name: WFTPD 2.4.1RC11多个漏洞
entry.source: Posted to BugTraq on July 21, 2000 by Blue Panda <bluepanda@dwarf.box.sk>
entry.vuln-descript: WFTPD和WFTPD Pro 2.41版本存在漏洞。远程攻击者通过在移动文件时执行STATUS (STAT)命令获取文件的真实路径名。
entry.vuln-solution: Update to WFTPD 2.4.1RC12

entry.name: WFTPD 2.4.1RC11多个漏洞
entry.source: Posted to BugTraq on July 21, 2000 by Blue Panda <bluepanda@dwarf.box.sk>
entry.vuln-descript: WFTPD和WFTPD Pro 2.41版本存在漏洞。远程攻击者通过使用RESTART (REST)命令且书写超出了文件的末尾，或者写入不存在的文件，借助如STORE UNIQUE (STOU), STORE (STOR),或者APPEND (APPE)命令导致服务拒绝。
entry.vuln-solution: Update to WFTPD 2.4.1RC12

entry.name: WFTPD 2.4.1RC11多个漏洞
entry.source: Posted to BugTraq on July 21, 2000 by Blue Panda <bluepanda@dwarf.box.sk>
entry.vuln-descript: WFTPD和WFTPD Pro 2.41版本存在漏洞。远程攻击者通过在登录到服务器之前执行MLST命令导致服务拒绝。
entry.vuln-solution: Update to WFTPD 2.4.1RC12

entry.name: IBM WebSphere读取可执行web文件的源代码漏洞。
entry.vuln-descript: IBM WebSphere存在漏洞。远程攻击者通过使用包含"/servlet/file"字符串的URL直接调用默认的InvokerServlet从而读取可执行web文件的源代码。

ref.ref-name: 20000723 IBM WebSphere default servlet handler showcode vulnerability

entry.name: AnalogX Proxy DoS漏洞
entry.source: This vulnerability was first reported in an advisory released by Foundstone Inc. on July 25, 2000 which credits Robin Keir (robin.keir@foundstone.com) and Stuart McClure (stuart.mcclure@foundstone.com) with the discovery.
entry.vuln-descript: AnalogX proxy server 4.04及其之前版本存在缓冲区溢出漏洞。远程攻击者借助SMTP协议中的超长HELO命令导致服务拒绝。
entry.vuln-solution: This vulnerability has been addressed in the latest version of the AnalogX Proxy server which is available at: http://www.analogx.com/contents/download/network/proxy.htm

entry.name: Windows执行任意命令漏洞
entry.vuln-descript: Windows NT和Windows 2000版本Windows Shell 可执行的(Explorer.exe)注册入口使用相关路径名。本地用户通过在%Systemdrive%目录中插入一个名为Explorer.exe的Trojan Horse从而执行任意命令。

entry.name: AnalogX Proxy DoS漏洞
entry.source: This vulnerability was first reported in an advisory released by Foundstone Inc. on July 25, 2000 which credits Robin Keir (robin.keir@foundstone.com) and Stuart McClure (stuart.mcclure@foundstone.com) with the discovery.
entry.vuln-descript: AnalogX proxy server 4.04及其之前版本存在缓冲区溢出漏洞。远程攻击者借助SOCKS4 CONNECT请求中的超长用户ID导致服务拒绝。
entry.vuln-solution: This vulnerability has been addressed in the latest version of the AnalogX Proxy server which is available at: http://www.analogx.com/contents/download/network/proxy.htm

entry.name: AnalogX Proxy DoS漏洞
entry.source: This vulnerability was first reported in an advisory released by Foundstone Inc. on July 25, 2000 which credits Robin Keir (robin.keir@foundstone.com) and Stuart McClure (stuart.mcclure@foundstone.com) with the discovery.
entry.vuln-descript: AnalogX proxy server 4.04及其之前版本存在缓冲区溢出漏洞。远程攻击者借助FTP协议中的超长USER命令导致服务拒绝。
entry.vuln-solution: This vulnerability has been addressed in the latest version of the AnalogX Proxy server which is available at: http://www.analogx.com/contents/download/network/proxy.htm

entry.name: Netscape Communicator JPEG评论堆覆盖漏洞
entry.source: Posted to BugTraq on July 25, 2000 by Solar Designer <solar@false.com>
entry.vuln-descript: Netscape Communicator 4.73及其之前版本存在漏洞。远程攻击者借助JPEG图像导致服务拒绝或者执行任意命令。该图像包含带有长度为1的非法字段的注释。

ref.ref-name: 20000823 Security Hole in Netscape, Versions 4.x, possibly others
20000724 JPEG COM Marker Processing Vulnerability in Netscape Browsers

entry.vuln-solution:
Netscape Communicator 4.74 and Mozilla M16 are not vulnerable to this issue. NetBSD: See the advisory in the "Credit" section for upgrade instructions. If upgrading is not preferable, several patches are available (included in the following archives): http://www.openwall.com/advisories/OW-002-netscape-jpeg-r1.tar.gz http://www.openwall.com/advisories/OW-002-1.zip i386: ftp://updates.redhat.com/6.2/i386/netscape-common-4.74-0.6.2.i386.rpm ftp://updates.redhat.com/6.2/i386/netscape-communicator-4.74-0.6.2.i386.rpm ftp://updates.redhat.com/6.2/i386/netscape-navigator-4.74-0.6.2.i386.rpm sources: ftp://updates.redhat.com/6.2/SRPMS/netscape-alpha-4.74-1.src.rpm ftp://updates.redhat.com/6.2/SRPMS/netscape-4.74-0.6.2.src.rpm 7. entry.name: AnalogX Proxy DoS漏洞
entry.source: This vulnerability was first reported in an advisory released by Foundstone Inc. on July 25, 2000 which credits Robin Keir (robin.keir@foundstone.com) and Stuart McClure (stuart.mcclure@foundstone.com) with the discovery.
entry.vuln-descript: AnalogX proxy server 4.04及其之前版本存在缓冲区溢出漏洞。远程攻击者借助POP3协议中的超长USER命令导致服务拒绝。
entry.vuln-solution: This vulnerability has been addressed in the latest version of the AnalogX Proxy server which is available at: http://www.analogx.com/contents/download/network/proxy.htm

entry.name: Microsoft Excel 97 / 2000 Register.ID漏洞
entry.source: Posted to Bugtraq on July 11, 2000 by Georgi Guninski <joro@nat.bg>.
entry.vuln-descript: Microsoft Excel 97和22000版本存在漏洞。远程攻击者通过Register.ID函数使用指明恶意.dll执行任意命令。又称为"Excel REGISTER.ID Function"漏洞。
entry.vuln-solution:
Microsoft has released the following patches which eliminates the vulnerability: Microsoft Excel 2000
  • Microsoft xl9p3pkg http://download.microsoft.com/download/excel2000/xl9p3pkg/2000/WIN98/E N-US/xl9p3pkg.exe
Microsoft Excel 97
  • Microsoft xl8p10pkg http://officeupdate.microsoft.com/downloadDetails/xl8p10pkg.htm

entry.name: SimpleServer WWW目录遍历漏洞
entry.source: Discovered by and posted to Bugtraq on July 26, 2000 by Foundstone Inc. <http://www.foundstone.com>.
entry.vuln-descript: AnalogX SimpleServer:WWW 1.06及其之前版本存在漏洞。远程攻击者借助修改过的..（点 点）攻击读取任意文件。该攻击使用%2E URL为这些点编码。
entry.vuln-solution: Upgrade to SimpleServer:WWW 1.07

entry.name: Linux系统pam_console PAM模块访问系统控制且重新启动系统漏洞
entry.vuln-descript: Linux系统中的pam_console PAM模块存在漏洞。当陈列管理员如gdm或者kdm具有XDMCP有效时，用户利用该漏洞访问系统控制且重新启动系统。

entry.name: Microsoft Windows NT/2000 NetBIOS名称冲突漏洞(MS00-047)
entry.source: COVERT Labs
entry.vuln-descript: Microsoft Windows NT/2000是微软发布的非常流行的操作系统。 Windows系统中实现了NetBIOS名称服务(NBNS)协议用作Windows Internet名称服务(WINS)。根据设计，NBNS允许网络对等端帮助管理名称冲突，但这个协议是个未认证的协议，可能会被欺骗。攻击者可以滥用名称冲突机制，导致其他机器认为其名称发生了冲突，这样机器就无法在网络中注册名称，或放弃已注册的名称。 远程攻击者可以通过向NetBIOS名称服务发送NetBIOS名称冲突消息导致拒绝服务。
entry.vuln-solution: 厂商补丁： Microsoft --------- Microsoft已经为此发布了一个安全公告(MS00-047)以及相应补丁: MS00-047：Patch Available for "NetBIOS Name Server Protocol Spoofing" 链接： http://www.microsoft.com/technet/security/bulletin/MS00-047.asp 补丁下载： Windows 2000: http://www.microsoft.com/Downloads/Release.asp?ReleaseID=23370 Windows NT 4.0 Workstation, Server和Server, Enterprise Edition: http://www.microsoft.com/Downloads/Release.asp?ReleaseID=22138 Windows NT 4.0 Server, Terminal Server Edition: http://www.microsoft.com/Downloads/Release.asp?ReleaseID=24516

entry.name: SalesLogix eViewer远程拒绝服务攻击漏洞
entry.source: Todd Beebe※ todd@internetworking.com
entry.vuln-descript: SalesLogix eViewer是SalesLogix 2000软件包带的一个Web CGI程序。 SalesLogix的CGI管理实现上存在漏洞，远程攻击者可能利用此漏洞非授权执行管理功能。

ref.ref-name: 20000331 SalesLogix Eviewer Web App Bug: URL request crashes eviewer web application

entry.vuln-solution: 厂商补丁： SalesLogix Corporation ---------------------- 目前厂商还没有提供补丁或者升级程序，我们建议使用此软件的用户随时关注厂商的主页以获取最新版本： http://www.saleslogix.com/

entry.name: BSD mailx 8.1.1-10缓冲区溢出漏洞
entry.source: Exploit posted to BugTraq on June 2, 2000 by Paulo Ribeiro <prrar@nitnet.com.br>
entry.vuln-descript: Linux系统中的mailx邮件命令（又称为Mail）存在缓冲区溢出漏洞。本地用户借助超长-c (carbon副本)参数提升特权。

ref.ref-name: 20000605 mailx: mail group exploit in mailx

entry.vuln-solution:
The following patch was designed specifically for mailx 8.1.1-10 distributed with Debian, but should work on other distributions as well. Caldera has released packages that fix the vulnerability. BSD mailx 8.1.1 -10
  • Caldera OpenLinux 2.3 mailx-8.1.1-12OL.i386.rpm ftp://ftp.calderasystems.com/pub/updates/OpenLinux/2.3/current/RPMS/ma ilx-8.1.1-12OL.i386.rpm
  • Debian deb-mailx.patch http://www.securityfocus.com/data/vulnerabilities/patches/deb-mailx.pa tch

entry.name: Microsoft Windows 9x / NT 4.0 / 2000 NetBIOS缓冲腐败漏洞
entry.source: Discovered by Anthony Osborne and posted to Bugtraq on August 29, 2000 by COVERT Labs <seclabs@nai.com>.
entry.vuln-descript: 用于Microsoft Windows 95,98,NT,和2000版本中CIFS Browser Protocol和NetBIOS之间存在相互影响，远程攻击者借助单播或者UDP播放数据包中受欺骗的Browse Frame Request修改动态NetBIOS名称缓存条目。

ref.ref-name: 20000829 Re: [COVERT-2000-10] Windows NetBIOS Unsolicited Cache Corruption

entry.vuln-solution: Currently the SecurityFocus staff are not aware of any vendor supplied patches for this issue. If you feel we are in error or are aware of more recent information, please mail us at: vuldb@securityfocus.com.

entry.name: FreeBSD fts库缓冲区溢出漏洞
entry.source: This vulnerability was released to the Bugtraq mailing list as FreeBSD Advisory FreeBSD-SA-99:05 by Patrick Oonk <patrick@PINE.NL> on Thu, 16 Sep 1999.
entry.vuln-descript: FreeBSD fts库存在缓冲区溢出漏洞。通常本地用户借助周期性的程序修改任意文件。

entry.name: 镜像文件创建漏洞
entry.source: This vulnerability was found by Wise Cat <wise@tomcat.ru>.
entry.vuln-descript: Linux系统中的镜像文件存在漏洞。远程攻击者利用该漏洞创建本地目标目录的上一级文件。

ref.ref-name: 19991018 Incorrect directory name handling in mirror

entry.vuln-solution: Apply the following patch to mirror: *** mirror.pl Mon Jun 8 11:55:27 1998 --- /usr/local/mirror2.9/mirror Wed Sep 29 16:34:01 1999 *************** *** 2657,2662 **** --- 2657,2701 ---- $no_rename = (! $remote_has_rename) || ($remote_fs eq 'macos' && ! $get_file); foreach $src_path ( @xfer_src ){ + + ## + #BEGIN jcp@EUnet.pt 1999/09/29 + # + #Date: Tue, 28 Sep 1999 18:27:54 +0400 + #From: 3APA3A <wise@tomcat.ru> + #To: BUGTRAQ@SECURITYFOCUS.COM + #Subject: mirror 2.9 hole + # + #Hello BUGTRAQ@SECURITYFOCUS.COM, + # + #mirror is a Perl script which is widely used for making copy of remote + #FTP site. It's included in FreeBSD packages. There are security holes, + #which allows overwrite local files from remote ftp site with + #permissions of the user who uses mirror. Then retrieving directory + #listing mirror doesn't check filename or directory name to contain + #".." or "\" This allows to create or overwrite files in directory + #different from destination. + # + #To simply test this bug you can create " .." directory on your ftp + #site and mirror your site. Mirror will create temporary files in + #directory one level higher then specifyed. This way you couldn't + #overwrite some useful information, but this may be used, for example, + #to fill out / directory (if mirror is ran from root). + # + #But with putting little changes into you ftpd (for example making him + #change '\' to '/' on listings) you can force mirror to overwrite _any_ + #file with permissions of mirror user then he mirrors your ftp site. + # + # + #Tested with: + #$ mirror -v + #$Id: mirror.pl,v 2.9 1998/05/29 19:01:07 lmjm Exp lmjm $ + + if( $src_path =~ /\w*\.\.\//){ + &msg( $log, "WARNING: BAD dir detected, skipping: $src_path\n" ); + next; + } + #END jcp@EUnet.pt if( $get_file ){ $srci = $remote_map{ $src_path }; }

entry.name: Red Hat Linux开发程序漏洞
entry.vuln-descript: Red Hat Linux中用户模式包的用户帮助像根一样执行non-setuid程序，该软件不激活glibc中的安全措施，程序借助glibc中的格式串漏洞和LANG或者LC_ALL环境变量(CVE-2000-0844)从而被开发。

entry.name: Tmpwatch任意命执行漏洞
entry.source: This vulneability was reported to bugtraq by X-Force <xforce@iss.net> on Fri, 6 Oct 2000.
entry.vuln-descript: Linux tmpwatch --fuser选项存在漏洞。本地用户通过创建文件名包含shell元字符的文件执行任意命令。

ref.ref-name: 20001006 Insecure call of external programs in Red Hat Linux tmpwatch

entry.vuln-solution: Do not use the --fuser or -s options with tmpwatch. Red Hat: Red Hat has issued the following RPMs that contain fixes for this vulnerability. Red Hat Linux 6.2: alpha: ftp://updates.redhat.com/6.2/alpha/tmpwatch-2.6.2-1.6.2.alpha.rpm sparc: ftp://updates.redhat.com/6.2/sparc/tmpwatch-2.6.2-1.6.2.sparc.rpm i386: ftp://updates.redhat.com/6.2/i386/tmpwatch-2.6.2-1.6.2.i386.rpm sources: ftp://updates.redhat.com/6.2/SRPMS/tmpwatch-2.6.2-1.6.2.src.rpm Red Hat Linux 7.0: i386: ftp://updates.redhat.com/7.0/i386/tmpwatch-2.6.2-1.7.i386.rpm sources: ftp://updates.redhat.com/7.0/SRPMS/tmpwatch-2.6.2-1.7.src.rpm Immunix: Immunix OS 6.2 (StackGuarded versions of the RedHat packages.) They can be found at: http://www.immunix.org:8080/ImmunixOS/6.2/updates/RPMS/tmpwatch-2.6.2-1.6.2_StackGuard.i386.rpm or http://www.immunix.org:8080/ImmunixOS/6.2/updates/SRPMS/tmpwatch-2.6.2-1.6.2_StackGuard.src.rpm Trustix: All users of TSL should upgrade to the new rpm: tmpwatch-2.6.2-1tr.i586.rpm (MD5sum: 3200b3812bfe6e87f326e240fed0686a) This file can be found at: http://www.trustix.net/download/Trustix/updates/1.1/RPMS/ or ftp://ftp.trustix.com/pub/Trustix/updates/1.1/RPMS/

entry.name: Apache mod_vhost_alias虚拟主机模块获取CGI程序的源代码漏洞
entry.vuln-descript: Apache 1.3.9,1.3.11和1.3.12版本的mod_vhost_alias虚拟主机模块存在漏洞。如果cgi-bin目录在文档根下，远程攻击者利用该漏洞可以获取CGI程序的源代码。

entry.name: Nachuatec服务拒绝漏洞
entry.vuln-descript: Nachuatec D435和D445打印机存在漏洞。远程攻击者借助ICMP重定向风暴导致服务拒绝。

entry.name: RedHat Linux ping缓冲区溢出漏洞
entry.source: This was first published in RedHat advisory RHSA-2000:087-02 on October 18, 2000.
entry.vuln-descript: 分配在Red Hat Linux 6.2至7J和其他操作系统中iputils 20001010之前版本的(1)outpack或者(2)buf多变的ping存在缓冲区溢出漏洞。本地用户利用该漏洞提升特权。

ref.ref-name: 20001030 Trustix Security Advisory - ping gnupg ypbind
20001020 Re: [RHSA-2000:087-02] Potential security problems in ping fixed.
20001025 Immunix OS Security Update for ping package

entry.vuln-solution:
RedHat has released fixed packages. Trustix recently released several updated packages: iputils: Fixes serveral problems in ping including a buffer overflow. gnupg: Fixed a serious bug which could lead to false signature verification results when more than one signature is fed to gpg. ypbind: Local root exploit. Linux ypbind Users of TSL 1.0x and 1.1 that worry about local security should definitely upgrade. MD5sums: 9e2bbf3ddd728da4cbab3ece1ba390b7 gnupg-1.0.4-2tr.i586.rpm 43d503eb306f202c794ca064980574ad iputils-20001011-1tr.i586.rpm 8625657f6edea52b88e0cff1dfff4bb4 ypbind-3.3-29tr.i586.rpm Get them at: ftp://ftp.trustix.com/pub/Trustix/updates/1.1/RPMS/ or http://www.trustix.net/download/Trustix/updates/1.1/RPMS/ Wirex has also released an upgrade to fix this problem for Immunix OS 6.2. RedHat iputils-20000418-6.i386.rpm
  • Red Hat Inc. 7.0 i386 iputils-20001010-1.i386.rpm ftp://updates.redhat.com/7.0/i386/iputils-20001010-1.i386.rpm
RedHat iputils-20000121-2.i386.rpm
  • Red Hat Inc. 6.2 i386 iputils-20001010-1.6x.i386.rpm ftp://updates.redhat.com/6.2/i386/iputils-20001010-1.6x.i386.rpm
RedHat Linux 6.2 sparc
  • Red Hat Inc. 6.2 sparc iputils-20001010-1.6x.sparc.rpm ftp://updates.redhat.com/6.2/sparc/iputils-20001010-1.6x.sparc.rpm
RedHat Linux 6.2 i386
  • Red Hat Inc. 6.2 i386 iputils-20001010-1.6x.i386.rpm ftp://updates.redhat.com/6.2/i386/iputils-20001010-1.6x.i386.rpm
RedHat Linux 6.2 alpha
  • Red Hat Inc. 6.2 alpha iputils-20001010-1.6x.alpha.rpm ftp://updates.redhat.com/6.2/alpha/iputils-20001010-1.6x.alpha.rpm
RedHat Linux 7.0
  • Red Hat Inc. 7.0 i386 iputils-20001010-1.i386.rpm ftp://updates.redhat.com/7.0/i386/iputils-20001010-1.i386.rpm

entry.name: Red Hat Linux iputils不释放特权漏洞
entry.vuln-descript: 分配在Red Hat Linux 6.2至7J和其他操作系统中iputils 20001010之前版本的ping在获得原始套接字后不释放特权，该漏洞增加本应在较低的特权中出现ping的漏洞暴露。

ref.ref-name: 20001025 Immunix OS Security Update for ping package
20001030 Trustix Security Advisory - ping gnupg ypbind

entry.name: thttpd tdate_parse()堆溢出漏洞
entry.source: Posted to BugTraq on Nov 10, 1999 by D.J. Bernstein <djb@CR.YP.TO>
entry.vuln-descript: Trivial HTTP (THTTPd)存在缓冲区溢出漏洞。远程攻击者借助超长If-Modified-Since头导致服务拒绝或者执行任意命令。
entry.vuln-solution:
Upgrade to version 2.0.5 or later. S.u.S.E. has released upgrade RPMs for thttpd, which shipped as an optional package with S.u.S.E. Linux 6.2/6.3. Acme thttpd 2.0.4
  • S.u.S.E. 6.2 thttpd-2.04-31.i386.rpmFor S.u.S.E. Linux 6.2 ftp://ftp.suse.com/pub/suse/i386/update/6.2/n1/thttpd-2.04-31.i386.rpm
  • S.u.S.E. 6.3 thttpd-2.04-31.i386.rpmFor S.u.S.E. Linux 6.3 ftp://ftp.suse.com/pub/suse/i386/update/6.3/n1/thttpd-2.04-31.i386.rpm

entry.name: Lyris List Manager获取管理访问权限漏洞
entry.vuln-descript: Lyris List Manager 3和4版本的web界面存在漏洞。列表订阅者通过修改list_admin隐藏的格式字段值获取管理访问权限。

entry.name: Microsoft FrontPage服务器扩展shtml.exe远程拒绝服务攻击漏洞
entry.source: sozni sozni@xato.net
entry.vuln-descript: FrontPage服务器扩展是Microsoft的一个产品，包括PWS和IIS版本，可以让网页设计人员方便的直接用FrontPage直接连接到PWS或者IIS上进行网页创作。shtml.exe是FrontPage服务器扩展的组件之一。 shtml.exe存在一个设计失误，远程攻击者可以利用此漏洞对服务器进行拒绝服务攻击。 FrontPage服务器扩展存在一个远程拒绝服务漏洞，可能远程关闭一个Web站点上的所有FrontPage操作。通过向shtml.exe提交一个包含DOS设备名(譬如con、aux、prn等)的链接请求，FrontPage 服务器扩展会挂起，不再响应后续的请求。为了恢复正常工作，必须重新启动IIS或者重新启动机器。

ref.ref-name: 20000823 Xato Advisory: FrontPage DOS Device DoS

entry.vuln-solution: 临时解决方法： 如果您不能立刻安装补丁或者升级，CNNVD建议您采取以下措施以降低威胁： * 如果不需要使用shtml.exe，请删除或者移出WEB目录。 厂商补丁： Microsoft --------- 微软已经发布了FrontPage Server Extensions 1.2版，它解决了这个问题： http://msdn.microsoft.com/workshop/languages/fp/2000/winfpse.asp

entry.name: Bajie Webserver文件读取漏洞
entry.source: First posted to Bugtraq by Andrew <labs@mdma.za.net> on July 30, 2000.
entry.vuln-descript: Bajie HTTP web server 0.30a版本存在漏洞。远程攻击者借助包含"...."即多个点点目录遍历攻击的URL读取任意文件。

ref.ref-name: 20000731 Two security flaws in Bajie Webserver

entry.vuln-solution:
The vendor has addressed this issue in Bajie Java HTTP versions 0.94 and later. Bajie Java HTTP Server 0.90
  • Bajie Java HTTP Server 0.95d http://www.utdallas.edu/~gxz014000/websrv/httpsrv.95d.zip
Bajie Java HTTP Server 0.92 g
  • Bajie Java HTTP Server 0.95d http://www.utdallas.edu/~gxz014000/websrv/httpsrv.95d.zip
Bajie Java HTTP Server 0.92
  • Bajie Java HTTP Server 0.95d http://www.utdallas.edu/~gxz014000/websrv/httpsrv.95d.zip
Bajie Java HTTP Server 0.93
  • Bajie Java HTTP Server 0.95d http://www.utdallas.edu/~gxz014000/websrv/httpsrv.95d.zip

entry.name: Windows 98上Microsoft Internet Explorer插入Trojan木马程序漏洞
entry.vuln-descript: Windows 98上Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.5版本中基于web的文件夹显示存在漏洞。本地用户通过修改Folder.htt文件且使用ShellDefView ActiveX控件中的InvokeVerb方式为文件夹中的第一个文件指明默认执行选项从而插入Trojan木马程序。

ref.ref-name: 20000828 IE 5.5/5.x for Win98 may execute arbitrary files that can be accessed thru Microsoft Networking. Also local Administrator compromise at least on default Windows 2000.

entry.name: Red Hat Linux umb-scheme全域可读漏洞
entry.source: Disclosed in a Red Hat Security Advisory, RHSA-2000:47-03
entry.vuln-descript: Red Hat Linux安装umb-scheme 3.2-11时带有全域可读权限的文件。
entry.vuln-solution:
University of Massachusetts scheme 3.2 -11
  • Red Hat Inc. 6.2 alpha umb-scheme-3.2-12.alpha.rpm ftp://updates.redhat.com/6.2/alpha/umb-scheme-3.2-12.alpha.rpm
  • Red Hat Inc. 6.2 i386 umb-scheme-3.2-12.i386.rpm ftp://updates.redhat.com/6.2/i386/umb-scheme-3.2-12.i386.rpm
  • Red Hat Inc. 6.2 sparc umb-scheme-3.2-12.sparc.rpm ftp://updates.redhat.com/6.2/sparc/umb-scheme-3.2-12.sparc.rpm

entry.name: HP-UX newgrp权限提升漏洞
entry.vuln-descript: HP-UX 11.0的newgrp命令存在漏洞。本地用户可以利用该漏洞获取权限。

entry.name: BAIR权限提升漏洞
entry.vuln-descript: BAIR程序没有正确限制Internet Explorer Internet选项菜单，本地用户可以通过修改启用BAIR的注册表项，从而获取菜单访问权限。

entry.name: WebShield SMTP拒绝服务漏洞
entry.vuln-descript: WebShield SMTP 4.5存在漏洞。远程攻击者可以通过发送格式为地址结尾带有一个.（周期）的电子邮件导致服务拒绝，该漏洞可以导致WebShield连续发送该邮件的复制文件。

ref.ref-name: 20000818 WebShield SMTP infinite loop DoS Attack

entry.name: Gnome安装系统配置文件覆盖漏洞
entry.source: First posted to Bugtraq by Alan Cox <alan@lxorguk.ukuu.org.uk> on August 19, 2000.
entry.vuln-descript: Helix GNOME Updater helix-update 0.5及其之前的版本不正确创建/tmp目录，本地用户可以创建空系统配置文件，如/etc/config.d/bashrc，/etc/config.d/csh.cshrc，和/etc/rc.config。

ref.ref-name: 20000820 [Helix Beta] Helix Code Security Advisory - Helix GNOME Installer
20000819 Multiple Local Vulnerabilities in Helix Gnome Installer

entry.vuln-solution:
Helix Code GNOME Installer 0.2
  • Helix Code i386: installer-latest-intel.gz http://spidermonkey.helixcode.com/installer-latest-intel.gz
  • Helix Code Solaris (sparc u64): installer-latest-solaris.Z http://spidermonkey.helixcode.com/installer-latest-solaris.Z
  • Helix Code Linux PPC: installer-latest-ppc.gz http://spidermonkey.helixcode.com/installer-latest-ppc.gz

entry.name: Bardon Data Systems WinU密码弱加密漏洞
entry.source: Posted to Bugtraq on August 16, 2000 by Nu Omega Tau <nu_omega_tau@altavista.com>.
entry.vuln-descript: WinU 5.x及其之前的版本使用弱加密存储其配置密码，本地用户可以利用该漏洞译码并获取权限。
entry.vuln-solution: Currently the SecurityFocus staff are not aware of any vendor supplied patches for this issue. If you feel we are in error or are aware of more recent information, please mail us at: vuldb@securityfocus.com.

entry.name: 微软IIS跨站脚本攻击.shtml漏洞
entry.source: Posted to Bugtraq on Aug 21, 2000 by Georgi Guninski <joro@nat.bg>.
entry.vuln-descript: IIS 4.0和5.0版本存在一些漏洞，没有正确防止跨站脚本攻击（CSS）。恶意web网站操作员可以利用该漏洞在信任网站连接中嵌入脚本，这些脚本是由客户端错误信息未经引用而返回的，然后客户端就可以像信任网站一样在相同环境中执行这些脚本。该漏洞也称为“IIS Cross-Site Scripting”漏洞。

ref.ref-name: 20000821 IIS 5.0 cross site scripting vulnerability - using .shtml files or /_vti_bin/shtml.dll

entry.vuln-solution: The original patches released by Microsoft have been reported to cause the server to consume excessive system resources, resulting in a denial of service. Microsoft has addressed both issues with the following patches:

entry.name: Solaris AnswerBook2管理员界面访问控制漏洞
entry.source: This vulnerability was posted to the Bugtraq mailing list on August 7, 2000 by "Lluis Mora" <llmora@s21sec.com>
entry.vuln-descript: Solaris AnswerBook2的dwhttpd web服务器管理员界面不正确认证其支持的CGI脚本请求，远程攻击者可以利用该漏洞通过直接调用管理员CGI脚本向界面添加用户账户。

ref.ref-name: 20000807 Vulnerabilities in Sun Solaris AnswerBook2 dwhttpd server

entry.name: Microsoft IIS 5.0 "Translate: f"头标记导致源码泄露漏洞(MS00-058)
entry.source: Daniel Docekal※ ddoc@MIA.CZ
entry.vuln-descript: IIS是Microsoft公司开发的流行的HTTP服务器程序，随同Windows操作系统捆绑发布。 IIS 5.0在处理某些带有特殊标记的HTTP请求时存在漏洞，远程攻击者可能利用此漏洞得到服务器上脚本的源码。 如果IIS 5.0接收到一个包含特殊头格式(Translate: f)的HTTP请求，同时URL末尾包含一个特殊字符("/")的话，IIS 会错误得调用脚本处理引擎，可能导致文件源码泄漏给远程用户。
entry.vuln-solution: 厂商补丁： Microsoft --------- Microsoft已经为此发布了一个安全公告(MS00-058)以及相应补丁: MS00-058：Patch Available for "Specialized Header" Vulnerability 链接： http://www.microsoft.com/technet/security/bulletin/MS00-058.asp 补丁下载： http://www.microsoft.com/Downloads/Release.asp?ReleaseID=23769

entry.name: HP-UX (S008net.init) net.init rc文件覆盖漏洞
entry.vuln-descript: HP-UX 11.00 (S008net.init)的net.init rc脚本存在漏洞。本地用户可以借助从/tmp/stcp.conf指向目标文件的符号链接攻击覆盖任意文件。

entry.name: NAI Net Tools PKI server strong.exe命令执行漏洞
entry.vuln-descript: NAI Net Tools PKI server 1.0 HotFix 3之前版本的strong.exe存在缓冲区溢出漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助HTTPS端口的超长URL执行任意命令。

ref.ref-name: 20000802 NAI Net Tools PKI Server vulnerabilities

entry.name: Netscape Communicator和Navigator文件泄露漏洞
entry.vuln-descript: Netscape Communicator和Navigator 4.04到4.74版本存在漏洞。远程攻击者可以通过使用Java程序打开使用“file”，“http”，“https”，和“ftp”协议的URL连接读取任意文件，正如Brown Orifice。

ref.ref-name: 20000823 Security Hole in Netscape, Versions 4.x, possibly others

entry.name: PCCS MySQLDatabase Admin Tool Manager信息泄露漏洞
entry.vuln-descript: PCCS MySQLDatabase Admin Tool Manager 1.2.4及其之前的版本在web根目录安装dbconnect.inc文件时存在漏洞，远程攻击者可以利用该漏洞获取敏感信息如管理员密码。

ref.ref-name: 20000804 PCCS MySQL DB Admin Tool v1.2.3- Advisory

entry.name: IRIX libgl.so缓冲区溢出漏洞
entry.source: This vulnerability was posted to the Bugtraq mailing list by LSD <contact@lsd-pl.net> (Last Stages of Delirium) on August 2, 2000.
entry.vuln-descript: IRIX libgl.so library存在缓冲区溢出漏洞。本地用户可以借助程序如(1)gmemusage，和(2)gr_osview的超长HOME变量获取根权限。
entry.vuln-solution: Currently the SecurityFocus staff are not ware of any vendor supplied patches for this issue. If you feel we are in error or are aware of more recent information, please mail us at: vuldb@securityfocus.com.

entry.name: NAI Net Tools PKI server文件泄露漏洞
entry.vuln-descript: NAI Net Tools PKI server 1.0 HotFix 3之前的版本存在目录遍历漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助注册服务器HTTPS请求的..（点 点）攻击读取任意文件。

ref.ref-name: 20000802 NAI Net Tools PKI Server vulnerabilities

entry.name: CGI Script Center Account Manager LITE / PRO管理员密码变更漏洞
entry.source: Posted to Bugtraq on August 23, 2000 by n30 <n30@alldas.de>.
entry.vuln-descript: Account Manager LITE不正确认证修改管理员密码的尝试，远程攻击者可以通过直接调用setpasswd参数的amadmin.pl脚本获取Account Manager的权限。
entry.vuln-solution: CGI Script Center has eliminated this vulnerability with the latest releases of Account Manager LITE and PRO. They are available for download at the following URL: Account Manager LITE http://www.cgiscriptcenter.com/acctlite/ Account Manager PRO http://www.cgiscriptcenter.com/acctman/

entry.name: IRIX gr_osview缓冲区溢出漏洞
entry.source: This vulnerability was posted to the Bugtraq mailing list by LSD <contact@lsd-pl.net> (Last Stages of Delirium) on August 2, 2000.
entry.vuln-descript: IRIX 6.2和6.3版本的gr_osview存在缓冲区溢出漏洞。本地用户可以借助超长-D选项获取权限。
entry.vuln-solution: SGI has released advisory 20040104-01-P to address this issue. Patch 5424 will be released for IRIX versions later than 6.5.17. Users should upgrade to one of these versions and then apply the patch when it is available. Please see the referenced advisory for further details.

entry.name: vqSoft vqServer 1.4.49远程长URL拒绝服务攻击漏洞
entry.source: auto45040※ auto45040@hushmail.com
entry.vuln-descript: vqServer是一个小型的Web服务器程序，运行于Microsoft Windows系统下。 vqServer 1.4.49实现上存在缓冲区溢出漏洞，远程攻击者可能利用此漏洞对服务器进行拒绝服务攻击。 远程攻击者如果给服务器发送长达65000个字节的"GET"请求，服务器将会停止响应。必需重启才能恢复提供正常服务。
entry.vuln-solution: 厂商补丁： vqSoft ------ 目前厂商已经发布了升级补丁以修复这个安全问题，请到厂商的主页下载： vqSoft Upgrade vqserver.zip http://www.vqsoft.com/vq/server/vqserver.zip

entry.name: 多厂商mgetty符号链接遍历漏洞
entry.source: This vulnerability was posted to the Bugtraq mailing list on August 25, 2000 by Stan Bubrouski<satan@fastdial.net>
entry.vuln-descript: mgetty数据包的faxrunq和faxrunqd存在漏洞。本地用户可以借助符号链接攻击创建或修改任意文件，该漏洞会创建/var/spool/fax/outgoing/.last_run到目标文件的符号链接。

entry.name: GoodTech FTP server拒绝服务漏洞
entry.vuln-descript: GoodTech FTP server存在漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助大量RNTO命令导致服务拒绝。

ref.ref-name: 20000830 [EXPL] GoodTech's FTP Server vulnerable to a DoS (RNTO)

entry.name: IRC Xchat client命令执行漏洞
entry.vuln-descript: IRC Xchat client 1.4.2及其之前的版本存在漏洞。远程攻击者可以通过创建web浏览器的XChat URL shell元字符编码执行任意命令。

entry.name: BEA WebLogic源代码泄露漏洞
entry.vuln-descript: BEA WebLogic 5.1.x存在漏洞。远程攻击者可以通过调用FileServlet的URL插入/ConsoleHelp/读取解析页面的源代码。

ref.ref-name: 20000728 BEA's WebLogic force handlers show code vulnerability

entry.name: FreeBSD Linux binary兼容模式权限提升漏洞
entry.vuln-descript: FreeBSD 3.x到5.x版本的Linux binary兼容模式存在缓冲区溢出漏洞。本地用户可以借助linux shadow文件系统的超长文件名获取根权限。

entry.name: CGI Script Center Auction Weaver目录遍历漏洞
entry.source: Posted to Bugtraq by Meliksah Ozoral <meliksah@meliksah.net> on August 23, 2000.
entry.vuln-descript: Auction Weaver CGI script 1.03及其之前的版本存在漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助fromfile参数中的..（点 点）攻击读取任意文件。

entry.name: Microsoft Windows 2000拒绝服务漏洞

entry.name: suidperl(也称为sperl) /bin/mail权限提升漏洞
entry.vuln-descript: suidperl(也称为sperl)在调用/bin/mail发送错误报告前不正确清除转义序列，本地用户可以利用该漏洞通过设置“interactive”环境变量，以及调用文件名包含转义序列的suidperl获取权限。

entry.name: Microsoft FrontPage服务器扩展shtml.exe远程拒绝服务攻击漏洞
entry.source: sozni sozni@xato.net
entry.vuln-descript: FrontPage服务器扩展是Microsoft的一个产品，包括PWS和IIS版本，可以让网页设计人员方便的直接用FrontPage直接连接到PWS或者IIS上进行网页创作。shtml.exe是FrontPage服务器扩展的组件之一。 shtml.exe存在一个设计失误，远程攻击者可以利用此漏洞对服务器进行拒绝服务攻击。 FrontPage服务器扩展存在一个远程拒绝服务漏洞，可能远程关闭一个Web站点上的所有FrontPage操作。通过向shtml.exe提交一个包含DOS设备名(譬如con、aux、prn等)的链接请求，FrontPage 服务器扩展会挂起，不再响应后续的请求。为了恢复正常工作，必须重新启动IIS或者重新启动机器。

ref.ref-name: 20000823 Xato Advisory: FrontPage DOS Device DoS

entry.vuln-solution: 临时解决方法： 如果您不能立刻安装补丁或者升级，CNNVD建议您采取以下措施以降低威胁： * 如果不需要使用shtml.exe，请删除或者移出WEB目录。 厂商补丁： Microsoft --------- 微软已经发布了FrontPage Server Extensions 1.2版，它解决了这个问题： http://msdn.microsoft.com/workshop/languages/fp/2000/winfpse.asp

entry.vuln-solution:
Tanaka Akira has provided a patch for CVS 1.10.8 . CVS Kit CVS Server 1.10 .8
  • Tanaka Akira cvs-server.patch http://www.securityfocus.com/data/vulnerabilities/patches/cvs-server.p atch
